review_text: Wonderful place to stay, absolutely beautiful location & home! Hosts were great, helpful, & responsive. This place exceeds expectations!

A beautiful home with vast views of big sky and high dessert. Very private. We loved watching the sunrise in the hot tub
and sunset with a glass of wine. Our dog loved chasing the ball down the driveway in the afternoon. Not too far from Taos, but you feel like you are in the middle of nowhere. I will definitely book again, but longer next time
Beautiful place with great amenities!
This is an amazing property. Everything about it is perfect. We will certainly return for future stays!
Always a great stay!❤️
Awesome location and home with exceptional mountain views and privacy!!
This place was absolutely wonderful. The view, the hot tub, the location. Bedrooms were perfect, kitchen clean, fully stocked. We couldn’t have found a better spot.

This house is special! The house is so cool and chic, but also really comfy and functional. It has everything you could possibly need! And the view…WOW…you look out over miles of magical land and mountains. Sitting out having our morning coffee with hummingbird’s flying around us and hot air balloons overhead was literally perfection! It’s also less than 15 min to Taos which has great restaurants and stores to check out. Would 100 percent recommend!

Lovely unique home. Was a nice get away to such a peaceful place. All the amities you could ask for. Melissa was a wonderful host and had clear instructions along with a great list of suggestions that helped make our stay even nicer.

Peaceful vacation weekend in a lovely house. Immensely enjoyed the outdoor space and indoor amenities. Kitchen is excellent. Close to neat hikes (Mamby hot springs) and Taos Mesa brewery. Enjoyable to stay at home as well. 10/10 would come back.
We were so lucky this place was even available for our needed days. Book it ! We wish we could had stayed longer. This place is the perfect mountain retreat.
Beautiful views, could use curtains in the front window at night

What an incredible stay. We loved everything from the location to the amenities. We were without absolutely nothing. We will definitely be back and recommend Melissa’s beautiful home to all of our friends and family. It was an amazing place to unwind and reconnect with our kids from our fast pace city life.
I can’t even begin to describe how magical this home is!

By far the best place we’ve stayed in New Mexico. Stylish, modern, bright and comfortable house with forever views in all directions. Close to great restaurants, hikes, skiing and shopping. Not usually a hot tub fan, but this one was irresistible. Excellent host. Can’t wait to come back.

Amazing location! Felt so private and peaceful even though the house is only 10 mins from town. Very little road noise; it was super peaceful to sit outside and enjoy the surrounding nature. Lovely hot tub! Would definitely stay here again.

Such a unique property! Mountains surround the entire house - incredible views, remote but close to town, comfortable beds, amazing kitchen space. Spent a lot of our time relaxing outside and taking in the views. Melissa lefts tons of great recommendations and was quick to respond to all our questions. Would absolutely stay here again!

To say this place exceeded every expectation is an understatement. The house was located amid a beauiful mesa with clear views of mountains from every window.
The interior of the house was spacious, updated, spotless, and so tastefully decorated.
We enjoyed every perk and amenity the hosts offered and everything was in brand-new shape. The beds and linens were some of the most comfortable I've ever stayed in.
I stay in a lot of rentals, and this one by far is the only one that felt difficult to leave. It's worth every cent and then some.

This is such a unique home in a beautiful and unique location. The amenities are great (especially the hot tub with Mountain views). Hosts are super responsive and thoughtful. Overall, an excellent stay.

Melissa’s Huckleberry Home was an absolute dream, I couldn’t have been happier with the house, the location or my incredible host. This was my first time in Taos, and not only did Melissa provide some incredible recommendations (Orlando’s was delish), but she also provided everything I needed and more to feel right at home. To say I was sad to leave is an understatement, this is by far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. We had the best time cooking in the beautiful kitchen and stargazing from the hot tub! Can’t wait to visit again someday!

Such a beautiful and relaxing space. Our group had an amazing time cooking in the well equipped kitchen, stargazing from the hot tub, and taking in the surrounding mountain views. Beds were really comfortable which is such a bonus.

We cannot say enough amazing things about this place! It was magical and transformative! The views from the hot tub at sunrise, are beyond gorgeous and remind you of the beauty of the world around us! Star gazing at night from the patio, makes you feel like you’re in a snow globe…in your own private oasis of wonderment. We loved how accessible Taos Ski Valley was for snowboarding…we made a day trip to Santa Fe which was fun!…and we enjoyed all of the restaurant recommendations provided! Melissa and Vanessa were prompt and responsive, especially when snowboarding plans changed during to extreme weather conditions on our first day in town. We highly recommend this amazing home if you are searching for a place to reconnect and recenter ❤️

I’ve stayed at a lot of BNB’s but this was hands down the best place my wife and I have ever stayed. Clean, comfortable and pure relaxation. We enjoyed the great views of the mountains in the jacuzzi and while having a bonfire. Everything we needed for cooking breakfast and dinner was supplied in the BNB. Vacation made easy by Melissa :)
Amazing stay. 10/10 would recommend.

Can’t say enough about our stay!! We had the most relaxing weekend. We felt comfortable and cozy at the house & couldn’t get over the views (especially from the hot tub). Melissa communicated with us all weekend which was super helpful.
We visit to get away. Because it's quiet. For us, the location is the draw. It just so happens that the house and the owner are also incredible.

This house was IDEAL. My husband and I can't say enough good things about it. The use of space is great, the views are unbelievable, the furniture is both elegant and not stuffy, just...it was perfect. The location is wonderful, within easy driving distance of good restaurants, downtown Taos, and the ski village. Melissa left us a list of awesome recommendations for restaurants in the area and they did not disappoint! We want to come back soon and stay longer!
Wonderful location, thoughtfully decorated, extremely peaceful. Melissa maintained proactive coms throughout. special place.

Had an amazing three-night stay at the Huckleberry House, while visiting Taos!
Was greeted with an epic sunset upon arriving as well as a handwritten greeting inside… set the tone for a great stay.
Enjoyed all the amenities the Huckleberry had to offer between trips up the valley to enjoy the slopes. Definitely will look to book again in the future... Can't say enough about the home or the location... If you stay at the Huckleberry House - I would encourage you to catch every sunrise & sunset!!!

We loved our stay at this house! Not only was it clean and comfortable, but the house and views were beautiful as well. The kitchen was well stocked, and there are many tasty restaurants within a short driving distance. We'd be happy to return in the future.

We had SUCH an amazing weekend in El Prado/ Taos. Melissa's house was incredible - as was the view from the hot tub! We went skiing at Taos and afterwards we were so excited to return to the airbnb to relax. Melissa also had great recommendations for local eats and drinks. Town was a little quiet this time of year, so we cooked a few meals in and the kitchen was great for that. The airbnb is very close to town, the ski mountain and other fun things in the area. Totally recommend doing a tour of Taos Pueblo. Can't wait to come back!

Great remote getaway for peace and quiet with 360 degree panoramic views. Every room in the house has a spectacular scenic view. Clean comfortable furniture, bedding and utensils. Easy access to the enchanted circle. Melissa is a friendly host that cares about your experience and very responsive!
We'll be back!
Jack
Incredible. A little slice of heaven that feels like you’re all by yourself though very close to anything you need. Delightful space. Perfect for a disconnected getaway.

We couldn’t have asked for more. Absolutely loved the decor, gorgeous views, hot tub, well stocked kitchen, wide assortment of teas, and beautiful heated floors. I injured my knee on the second day of skiing and coming home to such a cozy and accommodating set up was truly a relief. I would absolutely recommend Melissa and her thoughtfully curated space to anyone looking to spend time in Taos and the surround area.
Lovely place with beautiful views from the house and hot tub. House matched the pictures perfectly and was very well appointed. Just wish we could have stayed longer.
Amazing place! Beautiful views and lots of things to do and see In the area :)

This stay is an absolute gem in the Taos Valley area. The views are stunning and the house is so cozy and comfortable. Melissa was extremely communicative and friendly. I would highly highly recommend!

The Huckleberry House was a great place for a peaceful vacation! The hosts were really good about communication and checking in, and welcomed us to enjoy all the house had to offer. The view is unbelievable. Soaking in the hot tub surrounded by desert white sage while watching the moon rise over the snow-capped Rocky Mountains illuminated by alpenglow was nothing short of magical. The kitchen is well-equipped, with a really powerful gas stove and lots of counter space. Having a full bathroom for each bedroom is convenient. The wi-fi is fast and reliable. The property is not quite as isolated as it looks in the pictures, but the neighbors on both sides were quiet. The location is great. It was an easy drive from Albuquerque, and Taos is nearby, with great culture and lots to see and do. I hope to come back for another stay!

Our stay was wonderful at El Prada. The place was beautiful and well decorated. We loved the hot tub and many of the adventures we had. We appreciated the attention to detail and will recommend to friends.
Great space!

Huckleberry house was outstanding! Beautiful location and home. Close to downtown Taos, ski resorts, Ojo Caliente Mineral springs, Enchanted circle scenic byway and so much more.
It snowed while we were there so after a day of shopping we made Some soup and enjoyed the hot tub before Settling in for a movie.
5 stars!!! Can’t wait to book again in the spring!

This place was amazing - hands down our favorite Airbnb we've ever stayed at. Truly incredible views from every single angle. We lucked out and got to witness snowfall and a full moon over the mountains.
The place itself was exactly as described and pictured: clean, warm (stayed in late Nov), well decorated, and had an awesome, well-stocked kitchen. We cannot wait to come back... it was so hard to leave this place!

We loved our stay! The location was in great proximity to everything we wanted to do in Taos, Taos Ski Valley, and the surrounding area. The property itself was well appointed with comfortable beds, good quality linens, and had tons of amenities - even a few we didn't expect like Turkish towels (which we love) and fun toys our kiddos enjoyed. It's also difficult to describe how amazing the hot tub is under the open sky before the sun rises (props to Melissa for that strong rec). What a restful, dreamy experience we would highly recommend! Melissa was an amazing host as well and provided everything we needed for a great stay!

This home strikes a perfect balance between seclusion and convenience. Its unique location offers 360-degree views of the natural surroundings, making it an ideal spot for high-desert view lovers. At night, the experience is elevated by a hot tub session under the stars. The house itself is well furnished, featuring a stunning kitchen and a cozy living space, all maintained with the highest standards of cleanliness. Additionally, its proximity to some of Taos's best restaurants, just a mere 10-minute drive to the downtown area, offers easy access to the local culinary scene. This house is a gem, and we're already looking forward to our next stay!

This is the perfect place if you’re looking to relax in the desert. Taos is interesting and authentic. The people are friendly. The house is well appointed and very comfortable with a crazy cute loft for kids or a third bed to sleep. We spent every night watching the moon rise over the mountains and returned feeling refreshed. We liked it so much that we already rebooked.
Never have I had such a relaxing stay with stunning views. Everything was perfect and well worth the trip.
Melissa was a thoughtful, communicative and helpful host. We had plenty to do and her home was a peaceful way to begin and end our day. Stars were clear, sunsets and sunrises magical.

Absolutely fabulous--definitely a gem. Beautiful stargazing with the milky way overhead, a hottub, and a firepit. Gorgeous vistas. Far enough away from town that you feel truely away from it all, but the main strip of Taos is a 10-15 minute drive with everything you need and tons of cute shops. The place itself is stellar--super clean, updated, and decorated with some really cool pieces. Total zen. This is really what airbnb is supposed to be.
We had the best time on our trip. The house was beautiful and had everything we needed. The views were breathtaking! This was a dream trip. Thank you Melissa for being an outstanding host.

We have stayed in homes throughout the Taos area yearly for the last decade, from earthships far out on the mesa to condos and casitas squeezed in town close to the plaza. Our stay in Melissas home far surpassed all other visits!!
The design of the home is impressive, the views amazing, experiencing the Taos mesa stars at night from the hot tub and the incredible sunrise over the mountains each morning was awe inspiring. I have really enjoyed many of the places we have stayed, but Melissas home is the first place that made me say,,,I Only want to stay here in the future!!!
Melissa was attentive, easy to contact and flexible, I enjoyed interacting with her. The attention to detail in the home, the design aesthetic, the high end appliances and marvelous bedding made our stay carefree. Melissas home is truly the Only Place I want to stay on future trips to Taos!! Five Stars !!

Such an awesome gem! Far enough out of town to see the entire night sky, but close enough to easily meet up with friends. The house has great amenities, a fun hot tub, and is a super cozy place to stay. We hope it’s available the next time we’re in Taos!

We loved Melissa's place. We travel as a couple and like places that provide quiet, privacy and beauty; Melissa's placed lived up to our expectations. The TV in the living room was also better to watch than I expected because it's on the smaller side these days. But checking out some college football was great. The kitchen has gas burners (nice), and the hood is nice. The place was very clean. We highly recommend the place for couples. Thanks Melissa!

We loved the Huckleberry House, surrounded by sage brush, so much! The passive solar was terrific. The 360 view was spectacular. And, the outdoor space was excellent. If I ever come back to Taos I’d rent this house in a heartbeat

Better than the photos. Perfect Air BnB to soak in the beauty of beauty of New Mexico while being close enough to downtown Taos to easily fill up on NM cuisine.
We loved our girls retreat here. You will, too.

Close enough for the convenience of town but far enough away for privacy, peacefulness and quiet. Loved the expansive skies, especially for watching the spectacular storms. The layout of the house is perfect, very open and bright. We had everything we needed and really enjoyed coming back at the end of the day.
Nice to stay with lots scenic views.
Beautiful property, honestly even better than the photos.
We enjoyed our stay very much! The cabin was private with beautiful scenery. We appreciated the recommendations on places to check out and the proactive communication.

Fantastic home. Love this area. Super short drive to everything the area has to offer. Host and all the team were great! Great communication. Very clean with special touches and attention to detail throughout. Wonderful 360 degree views! Wouldn’t change a thing.

Melissa was an excellent host and the Huckleberry house is amazing. Perfect location to be near our friends wedding at Luna Mystica. Gorgeous views and and atmosphere just outside of Taos. We definitely look forward to coming back out in the winter.

The Huckleberry House was amazing. So relaxing and the views were incredible. The sunrise and sunsets were gorgeous and different every night. It was the perfect location to do day trips all around the Taos area and then retreat to the house and relax on the porch to take in the views or chill in the hot tub. Would totally recommend to anyone.

I think someone already said it, but...the views, the views, the views! Gorgeous & peaceful scenery, fantastic star-gazing (in or out of the hot tub!) and all the amenities you could need.
Great internet for remote working and a cool library to peruse. Only a short drive from town, and very much worth it for the extra serenity, highly recommended!

I may leave out a thing or two after a long night of travel, but we have nothing but good things to say about this house and location. This was our second summer in Taos in a year; last year we stayed near the plaza. This year we enjoyed being a little removed from the downtown scene.
The views from the house are incredible, there's easy access to town and all of the exploring we had planned, and we enjoyed watching small planes land and take off in the distance (far enough away that you can't hear them). I wouldn't change anything about the house. It was very comfortable even without air conditioning, it had everything we needed, it was very clean, very comfortable beds, and we enjoyed hours of sitting on the patio staring into the distance with coffee or cocktails. We took advantage of the hot-tub one evening and there was a gentle cool rain coming down; it was perfect. We were visited by the jack rabbit and many birds and we spotted a coyote crossing the road. Highly recommend.

Our experience at Melissa's home was outstanding. The location was private and beautiful and the house itself was even nicer than the pictures posted online. There are amazing views from every window, and the interior is tastefully decorated; you can tell that it was designed with intention and care.
The house is far enough away from town to feel isolated and peaceful while still being convenient to shopping/restaurants/etc - I don't think that it took more than 10 to 15 minutes to get to the Taos Plaza. The location also made it easy to make side treks to the Gorge (less than 5 minutes away) and the nearby ski villages.
Melissa communicated proactively throughout and provided numerous helpful suggestions for dining and activities. We would be thrilled to stay in her home again the next time we pass through the Taos area.

This is a magical place that I hope to return to often. The home is stunning, the views left us breathless, the hot tub and star gazing combination was an unexpected treat as were the daily jackrabbit visitors and the hot air balloons off in the distance at dawn. We had fun exploring the town, eating at great restaurants, and catching an unexpected concert at the brew pub just down the street. Truely a destination home to visit that we couldn't recommend highly enough!

Beautiful place, beautiful location. The home was modern and well-appointed. The views were amazing from every window in the place! A great spot, just a few minutes from local attractions and shopping/restaurants. A great escape :)
Location was perfect.. house was fantastic. Highly recommend!

What a magical spot--360 degree views! The house is meticulously clean with so many thoughtful places to sit and view the landscape, both in and outside of the house. We enjoyed cooking meals in the well stocked kitchen and eating at the outside picnic table under the stars. Also loved hanging out in the hammock and hot tub. The house is a quick drive into Taos but also you feel like you are out in the peaceful wilderness when you are home. Easy access to great hikes, bike rides, and runs. Hope to return one day!

The "huckleberry house" ❤️is a wonderful place to stay with beautiful views and peaceful surroundings. I loved the eclectic book selection as well as all the other amenities and immaculate home! I used my time there to 'reset' and I hope to visit the "huckleberry house" again soon as I love Taos!💕❤️
Melissa and her team do an excellent job hosting & maintaining a wonderful destination. Exactly the place you want to stay!!
We had an awesome stay and I will be missing those views! Such a great space and Taos is amazing. 10/10

Our family of 4 and our dog, Buddy loved our stay! From waking up in the morning to a beautiful sunrise to unwinding in the evenings in the hot tub, our stay was relaxing and peaceful with everything we needed. We loved the location, close to Taos, yet away from the
hecticness of town. The kitchen was well stocked with anything you might need to prepare a meal and the beds were very comfortable. I appreciated Melissa's guide as well as a nice selection of books.
Our family would definitely love to come stay again and would highly recommend it to others!

Our stay was the perfect, peaceful retreat we imagined. It truly felt magical.
Melissa was so helpful and responsive on all the things! The home was not o to beautiful and marched the description, but was an designers dream. So luxurious, carefully curated, and with so many thoughtful meaningful details. It didn’t feel like your average Airbnb or hotel stay. We loved it and can’t wait to come back!

To sum up Huckleberry House in one word, I would use Spectacular! The property is amazing and it was everything that Melissa said it was. The views are amazing and the house is incredible!! We absolutely loved the house and plan to stay there again next time we are in Taos. Hopefully it will be available. :) The home is so thoughtfully laid out and Melissa provided great instructions on everything about the house. The cell service is non-existent but there is good wifi at the house so you can still make calls. We saw hot air balloons over the Rio Grande Gorge and so enjoyed sitting on the patio with our morning coffee. If you are looking for a place to get away and decompress, this property is the place to go!! Thank you Melissa for everything!!
CKP
We had a great time at the Huckleberry home. Very peaceful and you can see lots of stars at night! Would definitely come stay again.

The views, the views, the views! The views are even better than described in the listing. Every accommodation you could need with a fully stocked kitchen and all bath amenities. Time slowed down for us while we were here in the best way possible. The hot tub was perfect at the end of a day of exploring Taos and the surrounding area. Patio was ideal for morning coffee. Watching the clouds and weather roll in around the mountains was the best show each day! Easy access into town and also to the Rio Grande Gorge Bridge and surrounding hiking, etc. While we were there, most of Taos experienced a major internet outage but we never lost service here!
Suggestions for what to do in and around Taos were also helpful, especially the restaurant recommendations. Melissa was a super host, very clear communication both before, during, and after our stay.
We had a fantastic time! If you are going to Taos - this is the place to stay!
Everything was perfectly appointed and Melissa was exceptionally communicative!

I have never stayed at an air bnb twice besides at Melissa’s place. And we hope to keep coming back every year!! The views are amazing, the location is perfect for hiking or going into town, the house is clean including the hot tub and it is wonderfully decorated. I can’t say enough good things about this house. You really need to see it for yourself because it’s even more amazing than the pics!

Melissa's home in Taos, NM was an excellent place to stay. The house design is interesting and beautiful with so many unique details. The bed's were extremely comfortable and the bedding was wonderful and high-end. Everything was so clean and organized and the kitchen had everything you could need. The floor to ceiling windows allowed beautiful views and elevated our stay. Her jacuzzi was perfect with just the right amount of privacy for comfort. Melissa and team have created a super comfortable setting for the perfect getaway. We enjoyed stargazing and just relaxing whenever we were at the house. We would love to visit again and bring family. I would definitely recommend this home and hope to come back. Thank you Melissa for all of your attention to detail and quick responses to any of my questions.
I can’t wait to come back. What a fantastic location and place to stay. Views for miles! Excellence in every corner of the house.
We loved our stay and plan on returning.

What a great place! Everything was just as described. The area was private and everything was clean and super nice. We loved the place and the kids loved playing in the sand! Great views no matter the weather and close to lots of attractions.

We had a magical stay at the Huckleberry House—expansive views in every direction. The house was clean and cozy, with many thoughtful touches. Definitely a place to get creative, unwind, or launch into a nearby adventure.

Beautiful house with more character than the typical cookie cutter Airbnb. Only ten minutes to town but feels like the worlds away when you’re at the house. Host communication was tremendously helpful and proactive. Excellent stay!

I spent 4 days and 3 nights in this amazing house with its 360 panoramic views... and I never got in my car the entire time I was there. Grant it, I was taking a break from the road to work for a bit. It was pretty much perfect in every way.

The perfect stay just outside of Taos. We found this to be exactly what we were looking for— tranquil, private, and just far enough from town (10 minutes) to still be able to enjoy the Taos restaurant scene. Melissa’s home was pristine and well designed, with a curated space that made it feel truly special. The views from the house for sunrise and sunset are unparalleled. 10/10 stay— thanks Melissa! We’ll be coming back to the Huckleberry House soon.

This was an exceptionally nice place to live in. There was plenty of living area that offered gorgeous views of the landscape, picturesque sunsets and sunrises through the many windows. The blanket of sagebrush softened the expected outside noise and produce a sound of silence for solitude. We drank water straight from the tap that is as good as any you can buy. It is located just far enough out of town to give that country feel but still close enough to enjoy the many amenities the city had to offer. We highly recommend the Huckleberry House and hope to be back again. BH

We stayed at Melissa's for a few nights with our two kids. The house is immaculate and is just a really special place. Filled with sunshine, amazing views, and everything you could possibly need. The hot tub is perfection, and the whole house is really well appointed and comfortable. I spent a lot of time just gazing out at the mountains, as the views are truly spectacular. Melissa was in touch throughout making sure everything was OK. Definitely one of our best airbnb stays ever.

This home is as ideal as it gets when it comes to a peaceful, beautiful, and rejuvenating stay! Every morning the sun rises behind the mountain and easily enjoyed from the hot tub. Small dining table outside to enjoy breakfast. Hardly ever saw anyone around. Felt very private and quiet. All you could hear is the wind.
Melissa is extremely communicative throughout the stay. Any questions were answered very quickly. The kitchen is amazing. Plenty of space to prep and everything in great working condition. Anything you need is available. Overall the entire property is very clean. Would definitely return to this amazing property!

We thoroughly enjoyed the accommodations, seclusion and privacy, and proximity to both Taos and other fun activities. The home was welcoming with exquisite views and unique amenities. We would love to stay here again!

Cozy, clean, comfortable. A relaxing, quiet home with all the modern conveniences. Easy to town and ski valley as well as all the natural beauty northern New Mexico has to offer. Host was super responsive and thoughtful. Stay here!
What a unique and beautiful place! We loved cooking in the spacious kitchen and the views of the surrounding area were gorgeous, the hot tub was the icing on the cake!
Wonderful experience and one of the best hosts I have ever had!
A great spot in Taos! Beautiful home and setting everything was as mentioned in the listing. Melissa is very responsive.

Wow! Stunning vistas from a beautiful, exquisitely designed and appointed home. Peaceful, inspirational, comfortable, modern yet welcoming, remote yet accessible. Melissa is a fabulous host, very proactive and responsive, with great recommendations. We will be back!

We were wowed by the design and layout of this beautiful home! So many comfortable furnishings welcomed us (beds, linens, reclining couch). There are tons of artistic touches (the space is full of creativity) and beautiful picture windows to soak in all of the desert and mountain surroundings both day and night.
The kitchen was the highlight for my chef husband (very well equipped), the dog loved the surroundings outside, and the baby had heated floors and a great crawlspace to play in. I loved the desk and library. Thank you for sharing!
Check in was easy. There are houses either side but you hardly notice them while enjoying the house. All very private.
We loved sharing meals at the family table, star gazing in the hot tub (super clean), having the mesa surround us on the doorstep and yet only being a short drive to town, the gorge, the mountains.
We really appreciated all the help and communication with Melissa and Vanessa who could not have made our stay more enjoyable!
Absolutely fabulous

We loved our stay at this phenomenal house. The house itself is clean, bright, spacious, and well-furnished, but it's the spectacular views from every window that truly set it apart - waking up to a dramatic sunrise over the mountains in the morning, and then enjoying a drink during the beautiful NM sunset in the evening. We especially loved the hot tub with mountain views, the floors with radiant heating, and watching a hot air balloon that seems to have its launch and landing area in a nearby field. Town is a short drive away, and we took advantage of the easy trip to Taos Ski Valley to do some skiing and snowboarding. We did not want to leave, and hope to visit again some day.

We had a great long weekend at Melissa's place. It was clean. well-stocked, comfortable, and the design really takes advantage of the mountain views from the mesa. It's in an enclave of similar homes that are somewhat close to each other considering the expanse of the land, but they have done a good job orientating the homes to maximize the privacy. Melissa was very helpful and I would stay here again. Thanks!
I will definitely be back!

My wife and I flew into Santa Fe and stayed here for our yearly snowboarding trip. We went to Taos and had a great time. It was a short drive, as were McDonald’s and some nice Mexican spots. The house is VERY peaceful and modern and we really enjoyed the sketching area. Highly recommended!
Wonderful vacation home with a hot tub to relax in at the end of the day!
A great place to stay and unwind.
Perfect stay. Melissa was very responsive and the home was exactly as expected. I would definitely stay again should I return to the area. Thanks for a great retreat.

Amazing spot with beautiful views! Great WiFi for working remotely and very peaceful for getting away from work. A great kitchen for cooking and a short drive to the Rio Grande, skiing and Arroyo Seco shops/restaurants.

We had such a lovely time here. Check-in was easy. Finding the right drive way was tricky driving in at night, but we made it lol. Maybe add GPS coordinates to your welcome message? Our favorite part was the panoramic views of the mountains and of course the heated floors throughout. amazing! Thanks for sharing your home with us!
A truly amazing home in a perfect location. We had so much fun exploring Taos and meeting everyone in the community.

We loved the house— it was a perfect place to stay while visiting Taos. The beds were comfy, kitchen clean and spacious, and the 360 view unparalleled. And did we mention the hot tub!? We’re coming back in the spring and will stay here again!

What a treat to stay here, we’ll be back again for sure!
The privacy, views, hot tub and floods of natural light were our favorite parts. Feels remote but less than 15 minutes from downtown Taos and all it has to offer.

This "Butterfly House" was a fantastic place to stay. Big views of the mountains and a short walk away fromt the Rio Grande del Norte National Monument. Melissa was a wonderful host and provided lots of help with the entry to the house. And...there was coffee in the kitchen (important for us) and it was stocked with lots of yummy munchies. Can't ask for more.
This is a partly solar powered (no solar at night obviously!) house, and is a modern design with almost 360 degree views of the mountains and a view of the Rio Grande Gorge. Love this place.

Loved staying here. Hot tub was amazing and the views were awesome. We will definitely be back. It was peaceful. Was a lil away from town to make it feel out of town but also close enough to get food to cook or eat at a restaurant. We were glad we could bring our dog. Wish the telescope wkuld have worked as we had a nice clear night with a full moon. Things were stocked and house was clean. Kitchen had everything needed to fix a nice meal. Was relaxing and peaceful. Can’t wait to return soon. Will definitely be our go to place to stay when visiting Red River.
Melissa’s home was beautiful and comfortable, and very clean. We really appreciated the chance to bring our pets as well!

What can I say that everyone else hasn’t already said? Literally the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. Incredible views, comfortable beds, massive and well-equipped kitchen, and so many special places for the family to spread out and explore or relax. The house is so thoughtfully designed and the natural light and views in every direction make for such a peaceful experience. I just can’t say enough great things about this home. Thank you so much Melissa. We would absolutely stay here again in a heartbeat.

It was amazing we hiked in the “backyard”
The vibe and feel was amazing grounded in the sand while playing fetch with our dog who was retrieving her ball from a patch of snow the hot tub was awesome, kitchen had everything we needed.
6 minutes from the Gorge bridge which was amazing would love to come again!

AMAZING!! This is a magnificent home that manages to strike the balance between being both modern and warm at the same time. The pictures don't come close to showing all of the nice touches the owners have included for you. The beds are super comfy, the heated cement floors are SO cool, the kitchen is awesome and has everything you'll need and the view of the stars from the hot tub each night will take your breath away. If you’re looking for a relaxing, spacious home base to explore the Taos valley, look no further. Our group of 4 plus two dogs had a wonderful time at the property. A great balance of tranquility and access to local activities
Amazing views and very quiet highly recommended
Oh wow. Beautiful high desert, wonderful hosts, tasteful touches. Fantastic. Go. If not, I’ll be there.

All the reviews are spot on. This is a great property and the host is more than accommodating. Our favorite part is the wonderful vista views and sunsets. The purple hue over the mountains will make you smile. Thanks so much for sharing your home.
Beautiful vistas in a fun town, we enjoyed our stay.

Melissa's house was great - she was very accommodating and generous with what she offers when you stay and has lots of little touches to make you feel at home. The location was great - views of the wide open plains one direction and beautiful view of the mountains the other direction. This was probably the best Air BnB experience we've ever had. Everything was absolutely perfect. Stunning views, amazing hot tub, great location, so many little touches that just made this a perfect getaway for my wife & I. We already can't wait to go back!

OMG this is a diamond stay!! I don't know where to start because all the other reviews are 100% spot on and can't say enough about how much we enjoyed this home for our girls trip. Little personal touches were left around the house for us as well.
If you're still pondering on whether to reserve or not by this point... don't. BOOK NOW you will not be disappointed. I will be back!

Fantastic home, location, and hosts. We enjoyed the architecture and thoughtful design of the home and the warmth of the furnishings. Well stocked for meal preparation. Great place to relax and watch the ever changing big sky views. Highly recommended!

What a wonderful place to stay if you're looking to unplug from it all or be somewhat close to the action. We had restful nights and relaxing mornings before heading out for hiking or wine tastings. We had a great stay here and hope you do too!

A beautiful, pristine home with terrific views. You can’t beat relaxing in the hot tub and looking out at the mountains. Perfect location to easily get to both the ski valley and Taos. Bright, cheerful and well appointed, we had everything we needed. Melissa was attentive and thoughtful. Thanks for a sharing your home.

Truly a Taos gem with incredible views, top of the line amenities/appliances, and beautiful craftsmanship. Check-in/out was easy, parking is spacious, and it's close to so much cool stuff! I hope I can stay here again and some point in the future!

Better than anticipated and we'll worth the effort to drive from Houston to take in this amazing gem near Taos! Host, home, and hospitality are top knotch! The views, wildlife, and landscape are stunning. You will definitely leave refreshed and renewed. Tell your friends and family. We will be back again real soon for another stay Melissa.

This house is an absolute gem. If you’re looking for a private stay that is still accessible to all the Taos amenities, this is the place. 360-degree views. Stocked kitchen. Lovely hot tub. Stable, fast Wi-Fi. A short drive to town and the Gorge. We were sad to leave and can’t wait to return again!

Really beautiful place in a lovely setting! Melissa responds quickly and was a really great host -- lots of little touches as well, handwritten notes. :) Really perfect -- and make sure to go outside at night: the stars are amazing!

We loved our stay at this beautiful house, Melissa was a fantastic host and provided everything you might need during your stay in Taos. Fully stocked kitchen, clean, comfy, beautiful setting, close to town but still feels private and remote. The views are stunning, the hot tub is divine. The temperature inside was perfect even on warm days. We can’t wait to come back and visit this special space again. Overall a fantastic Airbnb experience in every way!

This is one of the absolute best AirBnb homes we have stayed in. The home is bright, airy, and beautifully decorated. The mountain views are gorgeous and the perfect backdrop while soaking in the hot tub. We were ready to move in!

The desert oasis that is the huckleberry house was the perfect spot to enjoy time away with a few friends and our pups. My husband enjoyed raking what he called the zen garden each morning and the kitchen had everything we needed to prepare simple meals. We were worried about the heat without AC, but the airflow in the house with the fans was quite pleasant and we were very comfortable overall.
Awesome place and location
BEAUTIFUL property, amazing views, FANTASTIC HOSTS, everything you need...and more...perfect stay! Definitely recommend!!!
A beautiful house, with a wonderful location. Quiet and private, yet close to Taos for everything you need.

This place is amazing! Melissa has everything just right. Our family was comfortable in the two bedrooms and the views are stunning! The kitchen has everything you need and the decor is fabulous. We are so glad we stayed here. The house is close to everything, too.

One of the best and most rejuvenating places I’ve ever stayed. The house had perfect accommodations (starry nights, hot tub, fire pit, chef’s kitchen, dead silence) and was close to great restaurants, the Rio Grande and Earthships. A must-stay paradise.

The Huckleberry house is amazing! Great views of the mountains right out the back patio with a hot tub, beautiful space, and only 10min drive to town. Very good communication from the host, and many small touches to help you have a great time in Taos. The place stayed cool in July due to its passive heat/cool design. Highly recommend!

This property was BETTER in-person than the listing. Melissa has crafted a space to soak up the beautiful mountain view. We ate breakfast and dinner at the property each day, and Melissa had everything we needed. We explored the trails of Taos Ski Valley, visited a few landmarks Melissa suggested, then drove over to hike and explore the Bandelier Monument in Los Alamos. This property was a perfect central location! But it was also a beautiful space to spend time together as a family. Thanks SO MUCH for sharing your home with us!!

This was the best air bnb we have ever stayed in. The view is unbeatable. There is nothing like sitting in a hot tub and watching the sunset after a long day of hiking. Besides the view the house itself was awesome too so modern and incredibly clean. Good location just right outside the hustle and bustle of Taos. Easy to get to mountains and downtown shops. Also dog friendly which is a huge plus. We will def book here again!

Designers paradise! The Huck House is perfectly put together inside and out with the most epic views. The hot tub was incredible! Walking up to the sunrise everyday was simply stunning. We were so happy with our stay and grateful for the experience. Very clean. Thank you so much for hosting us.

This is such a peaceful and lovely spot. Close to town yet also so quiet and peaceful. We loved the simple modern aesthetic and all the lovely touches. The kitchen was well-equipped, hot tub was amazing, and we loved relaxing on the outdoor patios. Cannot say enough about how much we enjoyed our stay here. We come to Taos 3-4 times a year and this is definitely our new favorite spot to stay. Many thanks to Melissa and Jared for their hospitality and wonderful communication and opening up their lovely home for us to stay there!

10/10 would recommend! Beautiful and comfortable home with gorgeous views. Short drive to Taos shopping and restaurants. We especially enjoyed the wide selection of books in the house! Great for sitting on the patio to read and take in the mountain air. We will definitely be back!

I absolutely loved my stay at the Huckleberry house.
The home is very clean, beds are comfy and we loved the views!
Melissa was great to work with and communication.
The sunrise and sunset are fantastic,
The floors are great too and hot tub was really nice help a 'lot to relive stress really calm and the hammock was great really nice to lay in the morning!! And one last thing I really like is that Dogs are welcomed.
We truly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone considering to stay here.
Thank you!

I absolutely loved my stay at the Huckleberry house. The pictures don't even do it justice, it's open and gorgeous. I loved the chiropractic bench in the dining room, it really worked out some kinks I had going on, and the couch...well, let's just say I took quite a few naps on it, most comfortable couch ever.
The views and location are spectacular...I will definitely be booking this property again! Thank you hosts!!

We really enjoyed our stay. The home is very clean, beds are comfy and we loved the views! The serenity and the quiet was exactly what we needed! I would definitely recommend this place to others. Thanks Melissa!

I had a wonderful time! Will def go back as this was my first time in NM. Melissa was great to work with and communication was top notch. We found the house architecture and style to be a perfect match for our tastes. Overall, it was a perfect getaway if you like nature and want to relax.

Melissa’s place was beautiful and a great experience. The place was clean, comfortable and exactly as advertised. The views are wonderful, and the large windows don’t disappoint! The location provides a perfect starting point for any Taos adventure. Melissa was also very accommodating and available throughout our trip. We truly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone considering to stay here. Thank you!
Very easy to reserve with great communication. Very comfortable with essentials provided. Enjoyable hot tub with beautiful views to help with relaxing. Had a wonderful time and would go back again.

Highly recommend Melissa’s place! The house was awesome! Can’t beat sitting in the hot tub looking out over the mountains or staring up at a sky full of stars. The house was clean and well stocked with everything we needed. Melissa was great with communication and checked in on us throughout our stay. We will definitely be back!

Melissa’s place was super homey and stunning! The pictures don’t do it justice. A great tranquil place in the middle of the desert. Be mindful of smoke, fires, and wind. Can't say enough about how we enjoyed our stay. This was a beautiful, soulful functioning home. The spirit of our artist-hosts prevailed during the stay. This home is very cool and cozy- a perfect landing pad. We loved the solitude outside in the evenings. During the day there’s some construction activity on both sides of the house, but it wasn’t too obtrusive.

Charming, unique house, amazing night skies, awesome views and hot tub after skiing or exploring . What more could you ask for?

Loved the Slide Trail too.
Amazing place to stay, great house, great views, and great host. Very friendly and communicative. Definitely recommend relaxing in the hot tub at sun set and enjoy the view.
Great location, great place! We really enjoyed the quiet and even saw a couple hot air balloons.
Great stay! We will be back!

Amazing space! Great location! Beautiful landscape. The hot tub was a favorite as was the kitchen. Super peaceful space. Easy to get to the Rio Grande, Taos Ski Valley and Taos. Highly recommend. Will definitely visit again!
Love the place. Very private with amazing furnishings. The hosts were extremely communicative and great to work with. Already planning our next stay here!

We had an incredible visit to the El Prado house. The communication throughout the process and our stay was excellent, and the house and location exceeded our expectations. Beautiful location and home. Very much enjoyed it. Thank you

Great place to relax.
Great place to stay, just outside of Taos
This house is a gem! The location and views made for a really lovely stay. The house is modern with new appliances, a fully stocked kitchen, comfy beds, and a hot tub under the stars.

It's a cute and interesting house, the family who lives here seems really lovely, and the Taos plateau is magical. We were looking for a nice, quiet place to bring our friends, who came from out-of state, and we were excited to be able to stay outside of town. We didn't mind the rate, which averaged out to over $530/night, because we wanted something a little special, but were a bit surprised by some of the aspects of the stay. Since the photos on the listing were taken, houses have been erected on either side of the Airbnb property, and one of them was actively being worked on by some friendly contractors while we were there. Some of the amenities also seemed pretty basic for what we were paying (e.g. I would have expected shampoo, soap and conditioner instead of "3-in-1," but again that's just because the rate was so high). The mattress in our bedroom was also extremely flimsy and sagged, and we didn't sleep well (I'm guessing the Tempurpedic mattress mentioned in the listing was in the other room). Check-out time was at 10am, as opposed to the standard 11, and we were asked to do dishes, start the laundry and carry the trash down the long driveway and across the street before we left — even though we paid a $200 cleaning fee. It's all little stuff, but it made our stay, and particularly our last day, feel less like a vacation.
This place definitely brings you closer to the nature. Beautiful home surrounded by breathtaking scenery. Loved our stay there. Would love to go here again.

This house is so amazing it’s tempting to not just stay and hang out the entire trip!! The Huckleberry was perfect in every way. All the details were perfect; comfortable beds with nice sheets, great kitchen perfect for cooking and an exceptionally great salt water hot tub. Great!
Wonderful home + epic location and Melissa is a great host! Highly recommended for an off the beaten path Taos stay!!

Can’t say enough great things about this place. We came with my 2 kids and it was the perfect setup. The surroundings are picturesque. Highly recommend.

What a special spot, we would be lucky to return! Made some magical memories here. We were looking for a peaceful getaway to reset our souls and this is a wonderful place to do just that. Neat space space in an excellent location. Only 10-12 minutes to Taos and just a few more minutes to 99 other cool spots around the area! You’ll be very comfort table here!
So comfortable, well located, clean as a hotel but with all the comforts of a home. Beautiful sunrises and sunsets. Perfect place to stay when visiting the area.

If you are looking for a place with endless views that change by the hour, look no further. From sunrise to sunset you can unwind and disconnect from the busy hustle of the world. Such a great place to unwind and re-group! Wonderfully furnished with comfortable beds and the radiant heat floors are super cozy.

One of the best air bnbs I have ever stayed in. Great kitchen if you like to cook (I do), beautiful views, best saltwater hot tub ever. Excellent communication and lots of little touches to make your stay more comfortable !

This stay is incredibly unique and special. The photos just do not do the home or the surrounding scenery justice. This place is a great place to recharge and watch the sunrise and sunset. Melissa is great a communication and making sure you’re taking care of. I’d come back again and I’d recommend it to all my friends. You won’t be disappointed.
Absolutely incredible experience. House was clean, communication was clear and stargazing from the hot tub was surreal.

This place has every possible thing you could need. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Amazing house and great location. Isolated enough for peace and quiet, yet close enough to all the Taos has to offer. I would highly recommend staying here.

We absolutely loved Melissa‘s place! It is incredibly kid friendly, has phenomenal views, and we sincerely felt like home and did not want to leave. Cannot speak highly enough of Melissa‘s home! If it’s available, book it!

Melissa’s house is amazing. Every detail was meticulously planned. We loved the desert location. It was quiet and peaceful, yet close to all the activities we enjoyed.
We had all the comforts imaginable. A truly memorable spot. If you’re traveling in the Taos area, you will find nothing more perfect than Melissa’s home.

This place is a gem! We had everything we needed for our weekend in Taos. Easy drive to town, the ski valley, and other outdoor adventures.
We were able to relax and enjoy the stars. Definitely would book again!

Loved you Solar home; it decorated so cute and the beds were great! Loved sitting out on the patios taking in the view.
Would definitely come here again and refer to family and friends. Thanks for all your tips, very helpful!!!
Peggy & Tom- Ovilla, Tx

This was a great city escape, and a literal breath of fresh mountain air. The only potential drawback is if you’re visiting on a very hot day the home doesn’t have AC, I missed this on the listing. It does have heated floors and I’m sure it’s nice & toasty in winter. Otherwise, it’s definitely a hike away from home and a great place to decompress and relax. loved the earthship beautiful location!

I had a very enjoyable and interesting stay over 4 days. The main bed is very comfortable and the kitchen well equipped. I was impressed by how warm the space stayed during the night. beautiful retreat space, so quite, calm and star gazing is phenomenal. thank you, Rex!

What a truly unique experience staying at the Earthship! Stargazing is amazing, and sunrise views are gorgeous. Definitely recommend staying here if you’d like to experience something special and outside of the box.
So quiet and peaceful! And such a great experience to be able to stay in an earth ship. Beautiful location and beautiful house!

if you want the Taos Earthship experience but you still want to have a toilet, Wi-Fi, and electricity, this place is exactly what you want. It was cozy, well equipped, and clean. clean. Unique experience staying at the earthship. It was so relaxing and a perfect getaway from the hustle and bustle of the city. Lots to do in the area. Can’t recommend it enough.

Incredible home, Rex was very kind and made checking in and checking out so easy. The views were amazing and we really appreciated how warm and welcoming his home was. We for sure would book this home again in the future !

heaven on earth!

Enjoyed the time in the earth-ship and in New Mexico ….millions of stars at night….Rex was attentive, available, and helpful….the earth-ship had everything that was needed to make the stay comfortable

Incredible find! We loved the chance to stay in an earth home. It was a quick drive to town, but peaceful and quiet on nights we chose to stay at the home. The telescope was a thoughtful touch.

The Earth Ship was perfect for our group on our ski trip to Taos. Quiet and clean and a great value. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a clean, comfortable place to enjoy northern New Mexico!

This earthship is a treasure - the way all houses should be designed ! A very unique place! Our host, Rex, was readily available especially when we had a couple of instances when we needed him right away. He is very charming, considerate and fascinating man to talk with.

peace. quiet. stars. serene. all found in this amazing energy Earthship. stand on the deck at night, take a deep breath and look up...all stars...wow. and the sunrise is breath taking. surrounded 360° by mountains. you should stay here.
Beautiful location with amazing views of the mountains and stars. It was perfect.

The place is incredible. Such a unique place to stay at. Spot to watch a beautiful sunset. Endless stars to gaze upon. The house is so awesome! Couldnt recommend this place more.

We enjoyed our stay at this earthship. Convenient location for visiting Taos and Ojo Caliente. Plenty of heating, great views, dog friendly.

Enjoyed the quiet that the earthen walls provide. Disappointed you can't really see out any of the windows because they are covered with shade tarps and sheets. Also disappointed the main kiva fireplace in the living room cannot be used.
A really neat place ! About a 30 minute ride to Ski Valley. I definitely would stay again.
Super cozy space among lots of Earthship history. Had a blast skiing Taos and going to Ojo Caliente hot springs near by. Rex was very responsive and accommodating!

Rex’s earth ship was exactly what we were looking for. Quiet, beautiful, unique. There was plenty of space for the 4 of us. It was cold outside but the place stayed warm and cozy. Would book this place again for sure!

Earthship was exactly as we expected. We had difficulty locating the access road in the dark but G Maps was accurate and rerouted appropriately. I advise you follow the directions provided by Rex and look to check in before dusk.
Very comfortable and cozy home.
Rex was very communicative. Thanks Rex.
Nearby there is Pizanos a small pizza pub. The good was delicious and staff friendly.
Great place, nice stay!

We greatly enjoyed our stay at Rex’s earthship. When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised with the warm nature and welcoming of the home. The home was clean, spacious and cozy. We were able to enjoy the atmosphere of the space and stayed nice and warm with the space heaters. Amazing location, stunning sunrise and beautiful stargazing. We will definitely be back!
It was great!

This is a great get away in a cozy quirky wonderful earth ship house. What we liked most was that we could bring our dogs, and there were endless places to walk with them in the area, down different dirt roads and in sage brush fields. Rex was a wonderful host. The earth ship had everything we needed. We hope to retreat there again in the future!

We had a wonderful time at the Earthship! The home was warm and cozy and very peaceful. I so appreciate being able to take my dogs and they truly enjoyed themselves. Going outside at night to do some stargazing was spectacular and we really enjoyed going to Taos for the wonderful food and their beautiful art museum. We would really like to visit again. Thank you so much for everything, Rex!
Rex is an excellent host and his earth ship home is a fabulous place to stay! Highly recommend!

Staying in an Earthship is a unique treat. Rex and Rose are great hosts. The place is cozy and rustic. Which is fine with us. We loved the kiva fireplace in the bedroom with wood provided.
We went for a nature and quiet getaway. It was just that. The high desert, blue sky and rarified air fit the bill. For entertainment, Taos is only a few minutes away.
Enjoyable stay.

Rex was pa great communicator and gave us detailed I strictions and a warm welcome. The place was comfortable and private. The deck out front was amazing for enjoying the sunset and the night sky was unbelievable.

Staying in an earthship was a very unique experience. This earthship appears to be an older construction. It was different from the earthship construction and features described at the Earthship Biostructure Visitor Center. Rex is a very attentive and friendly host. Having read all the previous reviews my expectations were higher than my experience.
Had the best time staying at this earthship. The home is very cozy and has all the supplies one might need. Will definitely visit again. The bathroom is like a spa
Interesting place with an interesting history! Everything was good

Great experience I've been dreaming of for a long time, which has also been enjoyed by anyone who shared this trip! Beautiful and peaceful house, full of good vibes that invite you to relax, thank you Rex!

Rex was a fantastic host, coming over at a moments notice with firewood- there is a fireplace in the main bedroom! Swoon. Taos at this time of year was stunning and this place is a unique, well equipped and totally peaceful haven for creatives and those looking for downtime. thank you Rex

staying at Rex's place made the multiple hour drive absolutely worth it. breathtaking as soon as you pull into the driveway, lovely landscaping, and the architecture unmatched. I recommend this bnb with all my heart !!!
Wonderful experience! It was really great to spend the night in the studio and walk around the neighborhood.

Our party included 3 adults. We stayed 4 nights. It was a great location for visiting Taos, Santa Fe, Ghost Ranch and Albuquerque. The beds were very comfortable and it is a very quiet location. We had everything we needed including a well equipped kitchen, washer-dryer, outdoor living space, and peaceful, private surroundings. Everything was in good working order and we were very happy with our stay. We do plan to return and recommend this unique place to our friends. Rex was very nice and he greeted us when we arrived. I highly recommend the earth ship!

This place was a unique place to stay. Rex was very friendly and explained what the earth ship was about. Nice to stay in an environmentally friendly structure. Place was large and had everything you needed. Rex was a great host and quick to respond to texts.

Two friends and I, all in our 80's, drove a long distance to experience an earthship. It was well worth the 12 hour drive! Rex was helpful and the property is unique, peaceful and beautiful. Views are fantastic. We were comfortable and felt completely safe in the area. We enjoyed the house so much. I will recommend it to my friends who are interested in an earthship vacation. Thank you, Rex!

We loved everything about this Earthship. We didn’t know what to expect, it was are first time to the area. By the time we left we didn’t really want to leave. The views are amazing, the local people are very polite, the local food is great and the Earthship was just an amazing place to stay. We had the best two nights I think we could of had.
I wanted to stay in an earthship and by golly I did! Very interesting. Rex was very responsive.

Staying at Rex’s Earthship sparked the creative inspiration that my partner and I were looking to explore so we could learn about sustainable living.
Rex curated an environment that allowed us to decompress and sink into the earth. We enjoyed speaking with him about astrology and music and really appreciated him sharing his home with us.
The Earthship is one of the original models, so it was beautiful to see how well it stands the test of time and how self-reliant the home itself is. The surrounding land is beautiful and overall this was an experience we’ve never had (and highly recommend)!
We’re grateful to Rex for the experience, and grateful to see how magnificent an Earthship really is in person.
It was very fun to finally stay in an Earthship! We enjoyed the unique experience.

What an awesome place to stay. Rex was a fabulous host and his Earthship was gorgeous, comfortable, quiet and peaceful. The views in every direction were breathtaking. There was no problem hooking up to the internet and although I didn't watch TV, it was working fine. Bed was comfortable and the entire house was inviting with enjoyable local artwork and decor. Rex was very knowledgeable and informative about the construction of the Earthship, but only if you're interested and message him. If you do have any questions he answers right away. The house was very clean and neat. The kitchen has everything if planning to cook, including a gas stove. Great coffee and other supplies like salt, pepper and olive oil if needed. Speaking of which there is a gorgeous olive tree right out the door. Can't say enough good things about the place and the host.
We had an amazing time! Rex was super communicative and the house was so unique and beautiful. We loved the peaceful surroundings, hiking, stargazing, and art. Definitely recommend.
Great experience in a really cool earthship.

Rex’s earthship is an incredible place to stay. The views are astounding and the earthship is beautiful, comfortable and private. Rex was a great host who was very easy to communicate with. Highly recommended!
Definitely worth checking out. Beatiful open skys and cool evenings.

Could only stay one night but well worth it. Minutes outside town centre, have to drive, but at night the stars were so clear.
A great experience staying in an earthship, loved every minute of it. The new deck outside was great for hanging out at night and enjoying the wildlife.
Would stay again. Cheers

We had a great week in this Earthship nest while hiking in the ski valley, Angel Fire, and Arroyo Seco. This was a great jumping off place for hikes as well as being convenient to Taos for groceries, shopping and dining. The home is also relatively close to the gorge bridge &Earthship visitor center. We had everything we needed in the unit. The location was perfect for a walk down the road. I saw several people walking with their dogs. Lots of rabbit activity and loved seeing & hearing Says Phoebes who are living in the Russian Olive while sitting on the deck out front. The home is pet friendly and I wish we had brought ours along. Another fun tidbit was watching the dog across the way keeping watch from on top of the Earthship nextdoor.
The house was easy to get to and was well stocked for basic necessities. I especially appreciated the washing machine and coffeemaker. Easy in and easy out! Would definitely stay again.

This was a last minute stay and we absolutely loved it!
Very comfortable, Rex was very responsive and helpful with everything we needed.
Loved the house and can’t wait to build one on our own land!
This place is amazing, and will definitely be back! Rex went above and beyond for us, and his communication was great!

What an amazing place to stay. On a trip to New Mexico to experience all the natural beauty it has to offer, this stay was a perfect addition. Both the sunset and sunrise from the deck were amazing. Seeing the full moon was glorious. The house is quirky and beautiful. I just wanted to sit and enjoy the tranquility. I just wish I had had more time. Thank you Rex for a remarkable place.

Rex was very accommodating and easy to communicate with. We have wanted to stay in an earth ship for a while now and enjoyed being within a neighborhood of them, just 20 minutes outside Taos. Thank you for our stay!
I absolutely loved staying here! The inside and outside is so beautiful! I love all the little details. The Mountian views are incredible! I will be back again!
Rex was very friendly and accommodating and his home is cozy and warm. The location worked well for us to be away from it all and close to Taos and the Rio Grande Gorge.
Wonderful, peaceful earthship experience, everything we wanted
A perfect little Taos gem!

We had the best time at Rex's Earthship!! Our family consisted of grandparents with their grown kids and grands. It was truly a remarkable night with lots of sweet, fun memories made . Our only issue was that it was cloudy so we could not star gaze as much as we hoped. Thank you Rex for a most wonderfully fun night!!
Great place, friendly host, smooth check in process

This is a special place! Breathtaking views and the night sky is unlike anything you've seen before, I was lucky enough to catch a lightening storm coming in over the mountains while I was staying and it was incredible. The earthship is gorgeous and I miss my sun filled mornings in the kitchen, drinking my coffee and looking out over the panoramic view. The beds were so comfortable and even going in the middle of July it stays cool and you can play with the windows to get the exact airflow you like. Its a short drive into Taos but you would never know! Its so quiet and secluded. Rex is an amazing host and is so kind and helpful. If you're looking for a one of a kind experience to restore your soul, this is the place!

We loved staying at Rex's place! I would like to go back in a different season, just to see what it's like. (Pretty with snow) We were there in the first week of July, and it was the perfect temp inside. Cool enough to sleep. Such a cool place. the plants on the inside had crickets which had a relaxing sound, but only during dusk (they didn't go all night.) Just like all the other reviews say, it was a really cool place. G00gle maps took us right to his doorstep. A plus! what a great experience. Thank you Rex!
What a wonderful place to stay!!
Very cool place to stay with incredible views of wheeler peak. Very peaceful. Would stay there again!
Very fun place to stay in Taos! Quiet and roomier than you'd think.
Rex was a phenomenal host- if you feel the call to stay at the earthship, follow it!

The Earthship was charming with jaw-dropping views. The location felt really private and part of the gorgeous surroundings, however, it’s actually super close to Taos. The best of both worlds!
Only stayed one night, since we were passing through on a roadtrip, but would 10/10 stay there if we visit Taos for a longer stay.

The home was perfect for our needs. There are enough fans to be comfortable and we loved the warmth of the exposed mud walls. Directions could be better as the home is rather remote. Being remote, there is a lot of dirt around and lots of critters. This was not an issue for us and to be expected based on location. We enjoyed our stay.
Beautiful earthship. Loved watching the stars from bed. Cozy, had everything we needed and slept great! The jade garden is truly impressive

This is a wonderful earthship, quiet & away from the small town. The earthship has great views of the starry night sky that you can fall asleep to. It's unfortunate that it's not priced ideally so that more people could experience it, however it was worth it for us.

Very quirky stay in Taos! A classic earth ship with the fundamentals that make it unique and interesting. Beautiful plants and mud walls! The place is a bit hard to find but Rex was helpful in finding our way.
This was the perfect weekend getaway! The pictures don’t do it justice. It’s a great proximity to Taos downtown, yet the house itself felt very private and peaceful. Would definitely stay again!

Do you want to stay in a modern earthship that's completely self-sustaining? This one is not so. It's one of the early model earthships, and a very nice place to stay. However, you do not get the full earthship experience here. It does not have water collection, storage and reuse. It does not have an indoor food forest. It does not have solar energy power. It does not have colored bottles embedded in the walls for beauty. I wish the description would have been clear about this...I would have chosen a different modern earthship and not felt so disappointed. However, it does have 2 lovely bedrooms, full kitchen, living room, dining area, bathroom, some indoor plants, and is built in to the earth, with wonderful interior rounded walls and beautiful big windows. It's close to Taos town, which we enjoyed. Very private and responsive host. But, you had to go to the Earthship Biotecture Visitors Center to really find out and experience what a modern self-sustaining earthship is like.

I really loved my stay at Rex's Earthship. I loved the views and the space itself felt really good. It was nice to hear just birds and bugs at night. The furniture was comfortable and all the appliances worked well. I especially loved the way a cool breeze moved through the whole structure. I would definitely stay here again.
Great location! Loved the house and the Vibe! I’m
Friendly host and beautiful home! Highly recommended for relaxation.

Unique property with beautiful sunrise/sunset/nighttime views. Great natural ambient temperature inside, my husky dog felt comfortable at all times. The owner, Rex, was very helpful and friendly. The only thing missing was some extra kitchen amenities (pots, pans, utensils).

Tranquility at the ready... amazing Earthship Experience!
Nestled within a one-acre lot and surrounded by sagebrush and chamisa, the place exudes serene beauty and romance, a mere 15 minutes from town. Inside, the adobe interiors in dark and gold straw, rustic Sycamore Oak beams, flagstone floors present an enchanting spectacle. The sustainable design not only showcases the principles of green living but also provides great comfort. With an impressive pyramid nearby, the Earthship offers an immersive, inspiring stay, the likes of which are seldom encountered.
A peaceful retreat at this haven was truly unforgettable. We used the time for some high level planning and reflection We'll be back! A great example of sustainable living, this Earthship experience is badass and we hope to someday find (or build) an earthship to live in!
We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful earthship. It was very comfortable and relaxing. Rex made everything easy.

We enjoyed the Earthship! If you’ve never had an earthship experience, it is worth it.
Once you make it up the bumpy gravel road for the last mile (not a big deal), it is so peaceful and quiet. It’s a sweet little cozy environment and plenty of room for just 2 of us and our dog. We enjoyed our morning walks on the gravel roads admiring the mountain back drop and enjoying the interesting architecture all around. Although it is off the main roads and there is plenty of area to roam, if you have a big and fast dog like we do, I wouldn’t venture to let Fido off-leash if you don’t have voice control over your pet, even though you could let them off leash. There are rabbits and other little creatures, and other neighbor dogs that could be out and about and our dog would have ran up to or after other animals cuz he likes to play. So our advice is to do off-leash at your own risk. Otherwise, Rex was great and responsive as we had an issue arise that he was able to address same day!
The earthship is unique space in a equally unique place; there is a pyramid nearby. Lots of interesting furnishings. Amazing place to skywatch. Highly recommend for the adventurer.

Rex’s earthship was lovely! The area is in a beautiful location and the stay was such a unique experience. The place was very cozy and it was such a nice and relaxing time. Rex was very friendly, responsive and accommodating. Would love to go back!

A very peaceful & spiritual place. Waking up to snow at the end of April was unexpected, but it was gone by noon. Being dog friendly was a plus, my dog loved staying there( good smells outside)I certainly would stay at the earth ship when in Taos again.
so fun& lovely stay
We enjoyed our experience at an Earthship. The evening was chilly but we were able to do some star gazing which was lovely. The beds were very comfy!

Loved the sycamore oak beams!
Unique experience. Do it.
I wish we had more time to enjoy the space. It was quiet and cozy for sleeping, with an amazing view of the stars.

This earth ship is amazing and one of a kind. This is airy, open layout, full of natural light. Early morning outside temp was 23F, however inside was still around 65F without any hear. This is amazing and warm place to stay at.

The earthship is amazing. Such a great place to stay. Very homely, comfy beds, wonderful stars. Such a treat staying in an earthship and experiencing living in the eco house which is a big deal around Taos. Highly recommend it.
Earthship is an amazing place! It is so warm and welcoming, and the place feels like a living museum. Made me want to live in a house like this!
Such a peaceful stay and little getaway

Rex’s beautiful earthship was a peaceful refuge, surrounded by dramatic, breathtaking scenery. The home itself is cozy, charming, and inspiring (because earthships are the best). The huge paneled windows, natural light, thriving succulents and other plants make it feel as though you’re always outside. Our favorite part was the bathroom, with two shower heads, and beautiful tile around the shower/bath and sink. We brought our dog who had a blast roaming around outside. A treat to stay here, and we will recommend this spot to friends!
Lots of room and so quiet. We were there on a cold day and it was wonderful to have space heaters and heating pads.

Fantastic experience and my first in an earthship! Convenient location an easy drive back to town. The place was as described and very niche but more importantly peaceful and Rex is a very cool gentleman who is a wonderful resource for the area and good for just thoughtful discussion. I will come back.
The earth ship was really beautiful. The location has an amazing view of the surrounding mountains.
The place is located a bit remotely from town but is secluded and scenery is beautiful. The home has good insulation and we were fine with heaters off for a day. We would definitely come back!
Great little place not far from Taos. It was lovely getting to stay in an earthship! We appreciated how hospitable it was for our pup - including dog bowls.
We loved our stay and so did the dogs!

The earthship was fantastic. When we stayed the temperatures were between the teens and 30s the whole time, but inside it was always comfortable, even with just a small electric heater running. The location is extremely quiet a couple of miles down a dirt road and maybe 15 minutes drive from the center of Taos.
Getting the water a comfortable temperature for a shower is fiddly, but easy enough if you follow the instructions in the house. The kitchen is well appointed and everything works great.

Rex was great and responsive as a host. The earthship was a wonderful and unique place to stay, truly felt out of this world. Rex was also helpful in assisting my friend when she forgot the key and locked herself out, and when she left her own home key behind and needed it sent. Appreciate all the help!
Great experience in an earthship! Wonderful host.
Beautifully constructed home, had all the amenities, great scenery, would recommend.
Very warm and cozy environment.

We had a lovely but chilly visit. I would note guests do not have access to the fireplaces. Also the wifi is limited to only parts of the house. Overall a great opportunity to stay in an earthship. Thank you to Rex for being a great host with quick responses.
My partner and I loved our stay at this earth ship. It was very peaceful and secluded. Also, it wasn’t very far from the town of Taos, which was a plus! We will definitely be back!
I’ve always wanted to stay in an Earthship, and Rex’s place did not disappoint! Beautiful views, plenty of space, and everything you need. Only 35-40 minutes from Taos Ski Valley.

Rex’s earthship was a truly unique place to spend a few days. Very warm, comfortable and private. 15 minutes to restaurants, but definitely felt secluded and private. Great star gazing! Rex was very accommodating and made us feel welcome.

The Earthship was very cozy, comfortable and very rustic. We enjoyed learning about sustainability in home design, as well as the homy vibe. The house was well provisioned with clean linens, blankets, towels, etc and very good internet/ wifi. Rex our host was super responsive and check-in & check-out couldn’t be easier.
Only thing we regretted was not staying an extra night. Place was magical and very private. Definitely would recommend if staying in Taos, you won’t regret it.

Rex was such a lovely host. He met us as we checked in, charmed us with his knowledge of the stars and of earthships, and made us feel right at home. Sadly, we only got to stay a brief night, but we definitely felt the Earthship power! Very cool.
