Exactly as we had hoped. Hard to describe the view over the desert to the mountains. We're fortunate enough to experience a thunderstorm, amazing sunset and double rainbow all at the same time.

So beautiful. The road out to it is an easy dirt one. Also putting “Taos skybox” on gmaps and the instructions from the host made it easy to find. It was so quiet and peaceful.

amazing view, just as pictures, we enjoyed stay

Great place! So peaceful! Place was clean.

Great weekend getaway! Would definitely stay again next time we’re in Taos.

Beautiful spot! Great hosts!

I really enjoyed my stay here! Great location for going to Taos Ski Valley and the space had everything I needed to be comfortable.

Beautiful place! Not far off the road to get to places yet you’d never know it, being nestled quietly next to a main house. So quiet and comfortable.
Every space in the casita emanates the beautiful Taos charm. Such a comfortable bed. I will definitely stay here again and again.
Great responsive host! Thank you Lauren for a great experience, I look forward to staying at Casita de Indigo on my next visits to Taos.

We were fortunate to be able to book Jeff’s place for our two-night stay in Taos. Staying in this tastefully remodeled historic space made our time in Taos feel authentic. Adorable history home. Close to the plaza and easy walking distance. Nice parking. Clean. The sheets felt amazing.
Much bigger and spacious than the photos showed. Superb place to stay!

Place was great and so close to the Plaza. We walked to dinner and shopping. It was even nicer than the pictures showed. Everything was pretty, clean, and comfortable and we would definitely stay here again. The historic aspect of the house made it extra interesting. Loved our stay! Thanks!
Clean, comfortable historical spot in a great location.
Enjoyed our stay. Had a problem first night with one of the other tenants car alarm continuously sounding. Texted the host and he was super fast with the response and resolving the issue.

Would recommend the Mill House in to anyone staying in Taos. Very cool stay in a historic building. Updated and clean, and an excellent location close to everything.

Perfect place to stay while in Taos. It was close to the plaza.

Jeff's place is wonderful: full of charm, clean, comfortable, and close to the center plaza. While it was quite chilly outside, the house was always comfortably warm. If we visit Taos in the future, we will definitely stay here. Thank you!

This is a beautiful historic home right by the Plaza, very conveniently located and easy to find. Parking is easy as well. My friend and I had a lovely time staying here during our trip to Taos and recommend it highly!

Can’t say enough good things about my stay! It’s a quiet spot that’s still close to the plaza and all the spots I want to go to in Taos. Excellent and clear communication from the host and I had no issues with my stay. I appreciate that there were no additional instructions at checkout and everything was included in the cleaning fee. I’m looking at being back in Taos next winter and will hopefully book this place again!

This place was amazing! Open and spacious, felt right at home! The gas Kiva fire place was a nice touch. Down town is just a few steps away and Taos ski area is a short 30min drive. Communication was great and proactive. I would definitely stay here again!
Great spot. Would book again.

Very cozy cute place walking distance from the plaza and restaurants. Directions were easy and we didn’t have issues. I would recommend this place. If we come back, we will definitely stay here again.
We went to ski Taos. Location was great for dinner and drinks. The apartment was clean and comfortable
Great stay. Unit 2 was as described and was spacious, clean, and perfectly fit my group’s needs. Excellent location walking distance to all the good stuff Taos has to offer. Thank you!

Jeff's place was ideal for our short trip to Taos, where we wanted to be able to walk most places. This Beautiful historical home was very clean and well maintained. The adobe style combined the past with the present with all of the modern amenities. Very enjoyable and comfortable. Great location.

Mill House number 2 is in a perfect location for exploring Taos on foot. There are many restaurants, galleries, and even a grocery store within a 10-minute walk. Quaint place! We loved our stay.

Jack hosted us for our stay and was SO HELPFUL! He answered all my questions promptly and with kindness. The space was lovely! Beds and bathroom were great. The historical aspect was awesome and we were close to everything! Definitely would stay here again.

Jeff’s place was perfectly located in walking distance to everything. It was a wonderful stay and equipped with everything we needed. The property manager was responsive & helpful when we ran into a small issue with the fireplace.

We had a great time at Jeff’s place! Very convenient location close to downtown with a parking spot. It was perfect for our skiing stay and trip to check out Taos downtown. Would definitely stay again!
I would absolutely rent this property again. Beautiful cabin feel right next to the plaza. Thanks Jeff!!!

Jeff’s place was such a great find. We had a relaxing trip at this charming house. We loved the fireplace! We were close to a lot of great shops and restaurants. I can’t wait to come back.

this place is amazing, super clean and comfortable. Love the old charm, really close to the plaza. Great area, very private. Will definitely stay again. Thanks for letting us enjoy your place.
We stayed in both #2 and #3 of the Historic Mill House...and LOVED them both! So comfortable and homey. The perfect location for us. So many nice touches all around and wonderfully decorated.

A clean, cozy space that is perfectly located to great food and shopping. The host and property management associates were prompt to respond and friendly. Our stay was over Thanksgiving spent with family and we will be back!
Love the place - had a fantastic stay!

Fantastic location! Nicely decorated and very comfortable space.
We had a wonderful stay-very comfortable and great location. Would stay again!

This place was fantastic for our family of four. It took us a minute to find it, but it’s gorgeous inside, so spacious and comfortable and beautifully decorated. Close to the action in Taos. We are already trying to figure out how we can come back and stay longer.
Loved it!
highly recommend arriving during daylight if possible to find the rental and get parked.

The Historic Mill is located in the HEART of Taos….you can walk to just about anything you can think of. The place itself is very comfortable and has all the amenities you can think of. Do yourself a favor and book Jeff’s place and then just sit back and enjoy all Taos has to offer!

We had a lovely stay at this location. Only downside was the parking availability would fluctuate and we encountered a mouse on our last day at the unit. It’s a very old historical building so these things happen, but I encourage the owner to look into it.
The rental was absolutely beautiful. It was so comfortable and beautifully furnished. Very quiet & peaceful but incredibly central. Would recommend.
Jeff’s place was in the absolute best location for access to Taos plaza, shops and galleries. The space is comfortable and beautiful -highly recommend a stay here!

Jeff’s house was extremely cool and updated in a historic older building. We could walk to nearby restaurants and art galleries. The check in and communication were excellent. This is a great place to stay for visiting historic Taos.
The house is a beautiful historical house, spacious and comfortable. The location is excellent for walking around Taos.
What a gem of a place right by the plaza. The pictures don’t do the actual house justice. Wonderful stay.

We can't thank Jeff enough for the great place. Super comfy place to stay with my son (24) on a fly fishing trip. Walk to get food and have a cocktail! Beds were super comfy and all very clean. We will be back for sure. Thanks again!

Jeff's place is beautiful. The pictures do not do it justice. How lovely to stay in an old, historic adobe in the heart of Taos. The place was also comfortable and workable. We really enjoyed being here!

We were first-time visitors to Taos, and this place was perfect. It is centrally located, with most attractions walkable. It is a historic building, with the look, feel, and charm of the area. Lovely place, great character, great location.
Great location. Very comfortable and very clean. Would definitely stay there again.

Fantastic location & beautiful property! Unless you really need a dishwasher or can’t handle a few steps, I would highly recommend this place. It’s obvious this house has been well-loved over many decades.

Wonderful place and stay! It’s perfect for Taos. Don’t miss out!

This is one of the most comfortable airbnb's we've ever stayed in. The space is perfect for sitting together with family and chatting or watching a movie. Location was perfect, close to everything. Inside it was just like a dream. Lots of room, well furnished, and in keeping with the vibe of the area.
Great place . Lovely, comfortable house and terrific location. In the heart of town with a little buffer for peacefulness

Perfect location and adorable space!
Interesting and historic location close to Taos Plaza. Felt very “homey” and comfortable.
This house was in a great location. It was clean and beautifully decorated. We felt at home right away and thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Taos. Can’t wait to visit again.
Location is superb just a short walk to the square. Interior was well designed and appointed. It has everything you need to enjoy all that Taos has to offer.
Great place to stay at!
The house was spacious and comfortable. Wish we could have stayed longer! Loved how we could walk to stores and restaurants. Parking was provided and easy. I would stay here again!!

Perfect location for walking in Taos to shops, etc. Lovely place, comfy beds and couch, fireplace and TV. Host responds quickly if questions. Suggest you arrive in daylight as we had a hard time finding in the dark.

Wonderful stay - so cozy and close to town - would highly recommend.
Beautiful home, very spacious and in a great location. Would definitely stay here again!

Great spot right in the middle of central Taos. Neat building renovation!

Absolutely the best place to stay ! So comfortable, so close to everything! Clean, communication with hosts are all perfect!

A beautiful & comfortable historic space. Great location for walking to restaurants, galleries & plaza. Just WOW!

Fantastic place to stay in Taos! Location was amazing as well as the unit itself was SO nice!

Wonderful spot! The only problem we encountered during our stay was addressed promptly, and the location provided walking access to most of the places in Taos we hoped to visit. Highly recommended!
The house was everything we expected, we had stayed previously in the smaller house. The house is beautiful and very clean.
This is a great location near the Plaza. Be sure to enjoy all the sites and great food in the area.
Beautiful and clean place with all the architectural charm you want in Taos. The best location for walking to shops & restaurants, while still feeling private. Can't wait to stay here again.

Perfect location within walking distance of the plaza. Super cute and roomy. Be sure to eat at Michael's Kitchen while you are there!

Great value!

Really great value for a group of 4, at a time when accommodation in Taos can be eye wateringly expensive!

We easily could have spent more time here. Full kitchen and bring whatever you need for cooking. Would have spent more time hanging around this special abode if we had more time. Enjoy!

Lovely home five minutes walk from everything in Taos. Very comfortable beds, lovely linens etc. Good parking on the street that runs parallel to the left side of the left side of the house as you face it. Easy to walk to restaurants to eat instead of having to drive.
The place was beautiful and spacious! My husband and I loved our stay. So close to the Plaza! We would stay again!
Absolute gem of a place. Would definitely stay again

Spacious, clean, centrally located place in the heart of Taos. Great New Mexican food within walking distance. Wonderful gas fireplace. Main bedroom, while great, is close to a semi-busy street, so expect a bit of noise from passing cars in daytime hours. Loading/unloading a bit of a challenge for this unit. Solid internet connection.

Really beautiful place in an authentic adobe structure. Everything you need to enjoy the space is provided. Cozy fireplace is a bonus! Excellent location 1 block from the plaza, walking distance to restaurants, museums and entertainment.
Great place to stay near the Plaza. It's a historic building and has that feel. Very clean and tastefully decorated. Would stay again.
Very clean and comfortable; within walking distance of everything. We enjoyed our stay greatly and would stay there again.
great place. super location. everything was as expected
Such a charming place to stay! Loved this little spot and would stay here again. Beds were comfy, house was cozy and inviting. Overall a great find. Location was awesome too.
Great Location. Perfect for our stay.
Nice roomy house with big bedrooms. Right off the plaza with plenty of restaurants, bars and shops in walking distance. Good communication with owners, very responsive.

Mercedes’s property is a gem of tranquility. I was able to work remotely with the support of excellent internet connection speeds. The views are spectacular and the artistry of the interior is something special with her wonderful ceramic work. An easy distance to town. Terrific kitchen. She responded rapidly to questions and was a great host.

Mercedes place is located in a great location - right between the mountain and the town of Taos.
The area is super serene and beautiful (especially at night with the sky). Easy to get in and out of the area.
The house is very well appointed with a kitchen that has everything you typically need to cook, and beautiful hand made pottery for all the dinnerware. Comfortable beds, good AC/Heating, and clean and spacious bathroom.
Has a great living room with large smart TV and really fast (> 100 mbps) internet.
I would absolutely stay here again when coming back to Taos!

Loved this airbnb! The views were gorgeous, the beds were super comfy, and all of the art/aesthetics of the home were great. Mercedes was a super responsive host when I had questions.
Location is also great if you're skiing at Taos since it's ~20 mins to the resort and ~10 mins to town. Would absolutely stay here again!
Beautifully adorned place with easy access to downtown Taos. We loved our time in Taos and found this to be the perfect home away from home.
Gracious, clean, easy, and out of our hair.

Mercedes place is in a beautiful location with great access to Taos. The apartment has lovely art and amazing host-made ceramics. I loved the kitchen (REAL pots and pans!) with the large windows. Overall, it was clean and comfortable. That being said, a living room space that felt more usable would have been appreciated (oversized furniture was oddly arranged and taking up most floor space). For the sensitive traveler, it's worth noting that there's what appears to be a cell tower a hundred or so yards from the apartment, the heater is quite loud and that the mattresses are memory foam. There was also some trouble communicating...not sure if it was an issue with the airbnb text app but I did not get responses to my messages. If none of those things are a concern, you can absolutely count on a lovely visit in a lovely place!

Would definitely stay here again. It has a wonderfully equipped kitchen, comfortable beds and great views from all the rooms. Restaurants are a two minute drive away, and Taos and the ski basin within 10 to 15 minutes. Our host Mercedes was very responsive. All in all, a nice place to get away from it all.

I stayed for a couple of weeks and could not have been happier. The hosts are friendly and very easy to communicate with. The location is ideal to access either the town of Taos or ski resort. The home is well appointed, quiet and clean. Love the hosts pottery throughout. Highly recommended.

Comfortable apartment with extensive views. We particularly enjoyed its relative isolation. You are about 20 minutes to Taos Ski Valley and 10 minutes from Taos Plaza. We were fortunate to have clear skies, allowing breathtaking sunrise views from the kitchen.

The Barn house is such a cool place to stay! Appliances, space, amenities, the views, and the interior design of the house make it a very memorable stay. Additionally, Mercedes was a pleasure to work with and check-in /check-out were a breeze. This is my new go-to for weekend ski trips in Taos!
Absolutely wonderful apartment. Very comfortable and good style. I wish I could live here. Accommodates skiers and good space for relaxing. Great shower and washer/drier.
We absolutely loved our girls weekend at the Barn! It was the perfect peaceful getaway and our conversation with Mercedes and Rick was one of the highlights of the trip. Magical all around!

What can I say about this place that hasn't already been said. It was perfect! Right away when you walk in you feel at home. You can tell immediately that it has everything you will need for a great stay. The TV Room was great, the beds were comfortable, the views are exceptional, and the access is amazing! Even better, we were skiing at Toas Ski Valley and it's right along the route saving at least 10-15 minutes from staying more in Taos proper. Having all Mercedes' home made pottery was such a treat as it's beautiful as well as functional. And as a host you can't ask for much more. She was responsive and helpful with all of our requests. Really a top notch stay in a beautiful peaceful place for a family of 4. Thanks!

As most other guests have shared here, this place was even better than it looks in the photos! Absolutely immaculate and beautifully decorated, Mercedes personal touches of her handmade ceramic dishware and specialty items make the space feel absolutely divine. This is a perfect choice for a longer holiday or a quick weekend getaway.
This place is an absolute gem. Best views in Taos, in my opinion. The kitchen is fabulous for cooking. The host is extremely accommodating.
Mercedes did a fantastic job Beautifully renovating this old barn!! It feels great in there. Love the kitchen and the views. Mercedes was an exceptional host.
Mercedes place was so beautiful! We loved her pottery and the decor. The views! And the bunnies running around. She was extremely accommodating and lovely. Was perfect ✨

Mercedes’ barn is a lovely spot with amazing views. As advertised, it is very close to downtown Taos, but far enough out to feel like you are in the country. Mercedes was quick to respond when needed; she even alerted me when the place was ready ahead of time. The kitchen and bath were well stocked. The bed was very comfortable, and the art and pottery were lovely. I very much enjoyed my stay and will do it again.
We simply loved Mercedes place. It has all the amenities needed, the furniture is very comfortable, especially the beds. I hope to stay again in the future. Highly recommended.
Beautifully decorated. The pottery is amazing, can’t wait to have some shipped. Her daughter’s art is amazing as well! Perfect
Mercedes and Rick were great hosts. Friendly, very talented artists that have created a unique and peaceful home with views to enjoy the extraordinary beauty of Taos desert and mountains!

What a beautiful space - the location and surroundings as well as the beautifully furnished and well maintained accommodations! We loved our stay here and only wished we had booked our stay here longer! The home is full of Mercedes’ unique and gifted creations which added such culture as well as beauty to the space. This is by far one of our favorite of all our Airbnb stays.
Wonderful accommodations! Super clean and so well appointed. A full kitchen with beautiful pottery made by the owner. By far the best and most relaxing stay we’ve had at an Airbnb.
Mercedes's place was my home away from home. I felt very safe and the surroundings were breathtaking. Mercedes was quick to respond to me and was very flexible. This place is a 10/10 for me!
Mercedes's place was beautifully decorated, clean, and showed great attention to detail. My dad and I will definitely look to stay here the next time we're in Taos.
One of the most beautiful places I’ve ever been to. If I could give 6 stars, I would.
El Nido was such a nice space, we'll definitely return again. Beautiful pottery and decor, was a pleasure to be there.

What a magical space. I felt right at home. There are mountains on both sides of the barn so you can wake up and fall asleep to the mountains. The beds were comfy.
And if I needed anything at all I just needed to call.
I will definitely be visiting again.

I loved my stay at El Nido. The place is in a great spot, super cut and cozy and I was blown away by the fact that all the dishware and tiles in the kitchen and shower were ALL handmade by Mercedes. Instructions were easy to find/follow and I had no issues.
Mercedes and Rick are both awesome hosts. They were very friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again.

Absolutely loved this place! I would live here. It was beyond my expectations. The location was beautiful and private with amazing Mountain Views. The windows were large so we could let a light breeze in, watch a lightening storm and birds. The kitchen had everything we needed to make our meals. Washer and dryer were a bonus. Beds and couches were super comfy. Mercedes was very kind, flexible with our check out time, and very helpful.
Highly recommend! We are definitely booking here again.

Mercedes place was even more charming than in the pictures! Wonderful views, and charming touches throughout the house. It was stylishly and artistically appointed, and I loved all the amazing ceramics in the kitchen! Literally, it lacked nothing for our stay. Also- the most comfortable beds I've EVER SLEPT ON! The beds and bedding were like sleeping on a cloud! Mercedes and her husband are very sweet and accommodating as well, as we considered staying an extra night at the last minute, and they were swift to reply to our inquiry about that. Highly recommend!

How can I describe the feeling of magic? Fine details, attention on simplicity combined with luxurious comfort, wrapped in artistic beauty of the local variety is truly amazing. The foresight of, ‘why didn’t I think of that’ when you see it, the small touches and grandness of it’s location with sweeping views charms the heart. If you want to feel at home again and be your true self, this landing pad is perfect.

A home away from home. On our first trip to Taos, NM area, we were fortunate to have stayed in El Nido, hosted by Mercedes. The lodging could not have felt more at home. The location of the lodging helped us to feel tranquil and took us away from big city living.
Thank you for hosting! You’ve helped our first trip here very welcoming and unforgettable.
It's a bright place with beautiful views in a quiet and safe neighborhood. It has high-quality appliances and cooking equipment.

This place was exactly as listed. It was immaculate, nicely decorated and had wonderful views out every window. She has thought of everything in this space. Mercedes was easy to communicate with and was very helpful helping us get the Super Bowl on. I would not hesitate to stay here again and neither should you.
The Taos barn house is super clean, cute and homey. Loved the entire space, great kitchen, bathroom and loved the artwork. Had everything I needed.
Nice and clean. Great host!!!!! Would definitely stay again.
Very clean , and modern. The host is very welcoming and very respectful of your privacy. Great quiet locatin.

Plenty of space. Peaceful and restful. Absolutely beautiful interior and exterior. Wonderful functioning tub and shower. Tasty coffee. Super comfy bed and luxurious sheets. The place even smells great.

So happy to find this place! Very close to downtown Taos, easy drive to the hot springs in Ojo, quiet and peaceful property all day and night. Absolutely recommend! Thank you for the wonderful stay 🙏🏽
We absolutely adored Justin’s casita! We have stayed in a lot of places in Taos, but this was, by far, our favorite.
I loved this place, the place is very beautiful and comfy I will be coming again soon

Had a lovely few days int Taos. The casita was exactly as pictured— in fact felt even bigger inside than I was expecting! Excellent communication from the host, I really appreciated the local recommendations. The house is not walkable to the plaza but I had no trouble finding parking there. I would definitely stay here again!

Delightful comfortable accomodations. Location is quiet and peaceful. Justin was full of ideas for things to do, places to eat and ways to get to his place. He was a very good host. We loved our stay there.
Great stay. Exactly as described, perhaps better. Way bigger than photos! Everything was clean and organized. Easy access to town and felt safe staying there as a solo traveler

Just perfect!
Quiet, relaxing, close to food and drink.
The house is put together very thoughtfully, everything I needed and more.

We loved our stay in Taos. Justin was always responsive and sent us great recommendations that made our visit even better. Casa Benitez exceeded all our needs- it was peaceful, super clean and comfortable, and so close to the main area of Taos.
Loved the space, comfy and roomy, private and clean. Close to the Plaza and downtown but had the peaceful country vibe.
We had an awesome time in Taos, thank you Justin!

I’m big on aesthetic and pay extra to know I’m going to stay somewhere that aligns with my vibe. It was such a cute spot - only note is if you’re cooking steak open windows to not smoke up casita. Other than that loved how which he was to communicate and all the details.

We loved our stay at Justin’s house. The surroundings are breathtaking and the house itself feels like a haven. It looks exactly like the pictures, and what the pictures don’t show is how secluded and private the space feels, while only being a few minutes from downtown Taos.
Justin was very easy to communicate with and provided great recommendations. We would love to stay there again next time we’re in Taos.
Very comfortable, private and overall, a great experience
Great find!
Great stay. Nice and cozy space accessible to town. Very easy check in and Justin was great with instructions to get us in. Area is peaceful. Recommend to all!

This has topped my pretty extensive list of favorite airbnbs! Absolutely beautiful in every detail. Beautifully designed for two people, comfortable, peaceful, well-stocked, exceptional decor…it far surpasses the photos in person!
I had such a lovely stay here. The studio itself felt welcoming and cozy, and it was centrally located between some great trails and the shops and restaurants at the plaza.
Great spot for a bit of a retreat in the mountains! Really cute place with lots of character.
Super cute place. Close to town/actiities but still felt remore and quiet. The studio has everything you need and was warm and cozy
Awesome place and Justin was a great host - recommend!

Justin was really helpful. We asked to check in early, and he accommodated us amazingly. Beautiful place. It was cool to have the piano and guitar. I was able to woo my lady with the guitar, and she serenaded me with her mad piano skills. We had a blast. It was a great spot. Beautiful scenery. The only thing we found difficult was the immediate turn into the property at night. It was just kinda tight. However, it wouldn’t hinder me from staying there many more times. Overall 5stars.
Justin is the perfect host and Casa Benitez is one of our favorite stays. This is our third time staying at this special space and hope to stay again.
The space was very clean and cozy. The location was easy to get to and felt very private!

This place is spectacular!! My partner is an avid skier and he had an amazing time at the Taos Resort that was only a 25-minute drive from here. I got to enjoy the luxury and comfort of this beautiful space while he was skiing. The space is a treasure!! Recommend to anyone looking for a getaway!

Loved our stay at the Casita! We arrived at night but Justin’s clear directions made getting in easy. The home is lovely and sparkling clean. It had everything we needed for a weekend stay. We enjoyed downtown Taos and skiing at Taos Valley. Can’t wait to go back!

What a beautiful casita full of natural light and a peace instilling aesthetic. This was perfect for celebrating my 30th birthday and Valentine's day! The decor and attention to detail of this space was incredible in addition to its incredible story of its past life as a dance studio. The porch was lovely as was the curtain-encircled, claw foot tub. The bed and pillows were so comfortable we are interested for our own home. Justin supplied tea and coffee with a conventional coffee maker as well as an electric kettle and french press.
We would to back in an absolute heartbeat. Thank you Justin for an incredible retreat!

this cozy home former flamenco dance studio was perfect for a quiet retreat. It was an easy drive into the historic plaza and restaurants. Extremely clean and efficient in its use of space. I'd like to bring my husband with me next time!
truly wonderful place, the land is exquisite, I had a truly spiritual experience staying there. Would definitely stay again!
Loved this charming gem. Justin’s place was as described. Perfect for a weekend getaway and equipped with everything we needed. Great history and warm host. Loved it!

Love this spot! I can’t wait to stay here again. Casa Benitez was a beautiful, inspiring space. Thank you Justin for being a great host and providing us with so many food and recreational suggestions:)

This was absolutely one of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed in. Booked for my best friend's 40th birthday and it could not have gone smoother. Centrally located to the main part of town but still rural and secluded feeling. The landscape is gorgeous, the interior thoughtful, clean and quality. Nicer than some motels. The pillows were divine, the bath products, dish soap, all of it lovely. Coffee and good tea selection. Justin was helpful, unobtrusive, communicative and even brought extra blankets when requested at night. This is a wonderful spot and I will definitely be back.

This casita and the whole Taos experience felt like pure magic. The casita is gorgeous and has the most beautiful energy and feel. It’s well-equipped, incredibly cozy and decorated in a boho style that flows impeccably with its history and the surroundings. We felt right at home here and can’t wait to return again.
Beautiful comfortable stay close to everything in Taos
Cool spot, would stay again.
thanks for the stay!

We had the best time at casita Benitez! The interior was cozy and clean, the bed comfy, and a perfect location for exploring Taos. This was one of our favorite AirBnBs ever. Hope we can come back someday!
We adored the Casita vibe that is laid back but has a full kitchen. Beautiful outdoor area and really responsive host.

Justin's place is so gorgeous and really a gem that we were so thankful to find. I absolutely love Taos and wanted to find a place that was semi-secluded, yet still close enough to town. This place was it! The decor inside is so beautiful, and the atmosphere really makes the casita stand out from so many other places. We felt like we were right at home, but at the same time, it felt like we were on a retreat. There are so many thoughtful touches throughout the place, and we just absolutely loved it. The dining table was nicely decorated for us when we arrived, and we ended up having a peaceful candlelit dinner our first night. The bed was so comfy, the shower was perfect and we just loved being able to see the beautiful stars right in the front yard. We would love to stay here again the next time we're in Taos!
We really enjoyed the peace and quiet. A very good place to enjoy a romantic getaway.

Justin’s Airbnb was beautiful! You could tell every piece of decor was carefully thought out and placed. It was very close to everything we needed. The recommendations were very much appreciated and we truly enjoyed our stay!
This was a beautiful, soft, clean, magical stay. Best bed ever. I am going to have to ask him where he bought all of it.

This was a lovely place to stay. It holds a beautiful history and sweet aesthetic: the gentle light shining through the windows most of the day, the curves of the adobe, seeing starts at night through the skylights… The small kitchen had all I needed. The bed was comfy. Towels and sheets were bright white and clean. The host was kind and attentive. I loved the location- on the outskirts of town close to hiking trails. I had a great time.
We had a fantastic stay in Taos and this casita was perfect! Close to town but still plenty of privacy. Such a cute place!
We had great time here, would love to visit again!
You felt right at home!
We loved our stay! It was the perfect size for two of us to get away for a few days with all the amenities you need! Plus, it’s adorable and perfectly decorated for a home away from home feel.

My Sweetheart and I loved this place. It was immaculately clean, filled with bright sunlight, pleasant outdoor seating amongst large trees, a well appointed kitchen, and quietness. We also enjoyed the well-tuned piano and indoor hammock. We hope to return someday.

A great place. Close to downtown Taos, but it felt like you were much farther away. Perfect for 2 people. Justin also was a great host and communicator. I emailed several questions and all his suggestions were great. We rode a hot air balloon with the company he recommended and it was incredible. Dropped down into the Rio Grande gorge and saw mountain goats. Would definitely stay there again.

Convenient location to hiking spots and the plaza, plus the casita was beautifully nestled at the foothills of the mountains. The casita was truly a great set up for two. Felt spacious, with all the amenities we needed. Would recommend this rental to others and would stay again. Justin is a great host, he provided many useful recommendations in advance.
Amazing stay! The place was exactly as advertised- can’t wait to stay again!
We had a wonderful stay at Justin’s place. Beautiful curated space, very comfortable, clean and welcoming.

We absolutely loved Casita Benitez and Taos. Justin did a great job with hiking and restaurant recommendations, and he was very attentive. We will be back in Taos some day and would love to stay at Justin’s place again.
Awesome casita! Loved being there and it was so peaceful. Thanks Justin!
What a beautiful place for a personal retreat! Loved staying here!

Casita Benitez was a great place to stay, beautiful, private and cozy! We loved our stay there and would definitely stay again when visiting Toas. The apricots in the yard were in bloom, coupled with the smell if sage in the air, it was wonderful. We didn't even buy coffee on our whole trip because the coffee in the Casita was so good! Thanks Justin!
Great, peaceful place to stay just outside of Taos plaza area. Justin gave us some great recommendations for hikes, food, etc. Would stay there again!
The Casita is close to town, shopping and good restaurants. It’s peaceful and comfortable. Justin is a great communicator! Thank you for providing this space.

This is a beautiful property. It is close to some very nice hiking trails. Justin provided great restaurant recommendations and other activities in the Taos area. We loved our stay and will definitely be back on our next visit to northern New Mexico.

This place is beautiful, comfortable, quiet and peaceful. It is a very short drive to downtown (where there is ample free parking) so accessible to everything but in a quiet, beautiful setting. I highly recommend.

We had a GREAT time! The place was quiet, peaceful, & restful. The view of the woods out the large window was beautiful. Will be looking for a chance to go back and stay there again.
Highly recommend for a relaxing getaway!
Amazing stay! Justin was extremely helpful with recommendations. would love to come back again!
Lovely place. We had a great stay.
Great spot in a convienent location. Would stay again!
AMAZING boho-style studio. Loved every inch of the space. Many thanks for letting us stay!

Justin’s place was great! The location was gorgeous and super private. The proximity to nature was the highlight of the stay and loved that we could get into town in less than 10 minutes. Justin’s recommendations and responsiveness was so helpful as well! I would definitely recommend this stay.

Great place and location! Quiet, peaceful neighborhood. Very well designed with lots of natural light and warm decorations. Clean and comfortable. Justin gave great recommendations for local food and activities. Highly recommend!
A perfect place to spend our wedding night. We had the most magical time. Thank you so much.
Justin is a great host. Wonderful details like the indoor hammock and musical instruments made the stay unique. Hearing water run in the acequia was charming. Great location minutes to the plaza.

I’m in love with this place. Initially I was a little disappointed that it is quite far out of town but I sunk into the beauty/the serenity of the setting and the beautiful space. There’s a piano. There is a guitar. There is a ukulele. They are in tune! I used all of them. And wrote. And did yoga. And melted into the vibe. Justin’s recommendations where thoughtful and consistent with the aesthetic. I will be back. And may never leave next time.
We had a great stay. Justin was extremely responsive even late at night. The place was in very quiet area and nicely decorated we really felt like it was a retreat.
Great place. Clean, private, great location. Host was responsive and instructions very clear. Will definitely stay again when back!

Would definitely recommend Justin's place! The location, interior decorating, and overall vibe of the place was beautiful and peaceful! It was very close to the center of Taos, but far enough away for a quiet and it included a parking spot. The kitchen has a lot of amenities in the event you wanted to cook. Prior to our arrival, Justin also provided us with a list of things to do in the area.
Loved this casita! Especially the yard!! Such a great locale.

Justin’s space was absolutely beautiful. A perfect location close to everything yet secluded and tucked away from the street. Super close to beautiful hikes and scenic drives. The space was absolutely perfect and Justin’s recommendations for things to do/places to eat/hikes to do were wonderful and super helpful. Cannot say enough nice things about this Airbnb. Will definitely be staying here again!!! Thank you, Justin 🧡

Justin’s casita is a magical place. So much character and such great vibes. On our first night, we immediately booked a 3-day weekend to return in the fall. Taos was everything I expected and more. We will be back on September!!

I’d had this listing saved for a while and was finally able to make it happen. What a wonderful place with such an interesting history. I loved every minute of it. So peaceful yet so close to downtown Taos. Overall wonderful.

Great location for us to explore Taos and the surrounding area, and the accommodations were great as well! Loved the hammock, and so cool that we got to see snow falling (ok, I know the host was not responsible for that, but still). Definitely recommend!
Beautiful area and space to be in! Super comfy and extremely easy to get to things and/or just relax. Thanks for the great stay Justin! We had a wonderful time.
Lovely place with a responsive host.

The Casita Benitez is located in a quiet, peaceful spot. The surrounding area is rural with a scattering of small farms as well as lodging accommodations. We felt very safe at the casita. Justin answered our emails quickly and was flexible with our arrival time. The bed was enormous and so comfortable.
Absolutely beautiful place with great amenities. Close to downtown but far enough away that it’s quiet and private. Would highly recommend staying here.
Great place, super cute and clean. Easy to get into town but nice and quiet. Enjoyed our stay.
Justin’s place is absolutely magic. I loved my stay here and loved the history of the place. It had every single thing that I needed and then some. Thank you much for all the beautiful surroundings!

Beautiful place. It’s a big space well decorated. Very nice bathroom. The main sofa and tv are a little small. This place is spacious, private, with beautiful outdoor space and morning sunlight through all the main windows.
Even prettier than the photos! Giant windows looked out into a private, snowy paradise. The space itself is huge (formerly a dance studio) and it was clean and beautifully decorated.
Second time staying at this casita - great location, private, quiet, and with all the Taos vibes
Fantastic adobe with a unique history. Wonderfully cozy and thoughtfully decorated, in a great location…it was a great Taos experience. Highly recommended!!!

We had a wonderful time at this beautiful and thoughtful casita! Highly recommend. 5 minute drive from downtown. They thought of everything you may need in the kitchen for cooking and provided so many fantastic suggestions.
Great stay!
So cozy for our stay in Taos!
One of my favorite Airbnb’s I’ve stayed in! Beautifully decorated, super comfortable and cute. I loved this place and absolutely recommend it!
Lovely, quiet space. Comfy bed and beautiful style.

Wow!!! This was our favorite Airbnb to date. Clean, comfortable, full of character and thoughtful touches - I cannot say enough good things about Justin’s place. We had such a wonderful time thanks to Justin’s comfy and clean Casita and his great suggestion. Would recommend to anyone!!!
Loved staying st Casita Benitez! Peaceful setting, convenient to town and excellent host!

This place was fantastic! Close to town but secluded. The bed was so comfortable that I went home and bought the same bed sheets! Justin was super communicative, and made the stay easy. I would definitely stay again.

My favorite Airbnb thus far! Beautiful location, quiet (we loved the morning rooster 🐓), couldn’t have been decorated better or more beautifully, very comfortable, warm environment , and Justin was always responsive and kind. Can’t wait to book this place again!
A must!!!
Beautiful and relaxing space. We had a wonderful time.

Wow. What a wonderful experience. Justin was the best host and extremely accommodating. The casita was a dream oasis and only a 5 min drive to town and beautiful hiking trails. Wouldn’t recommend staying anywhere else when visiting Taos to be honest!

Comfortable and attractive casita with beautiful lighting from windows and skylights all through the day, located within easy distance of Taos and easy drives to nearby trails. The host responded readily to questions beforehand and answered immediately when a question came up during our stay. We're planning to stay here again next time we're in the area.

Perfect little casita that was the ideal base from which to explore Taos. Cosy, comfy, and stocked with everything you need, it’s quiet location and tranquil little garden were just what we needed to escape to after a super hectic year.

This beautiful and thoughtfully designed space made us feel right at home. Justin provided a lot of useful info on things to do and see before our arrival which made it easy to plan our weekend.
Would definitely stay here again and again!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Justin left great recommendations and made sure we had everything we needed. The bed was comfortable. We would definitely stay here again. We loved the ambiance.

Nice location, with a peaceful and secluded feel, while still being an easy trip into town for a meal. Justin was quick to provide suggestions for activities and the I found the decor fun and welcoming.

Nice cozy place! Loved the small extras of guitar + quality Bluetooth player.
Close enough for a quick drive to the square/ even better access to hiking in the mountains. First time in Taos, and felt apart of it history and style staying here.

Wonderful place. Comfortable and peaceful.
If you're visiting Taos, THIS IS THE PLACE! Such a cute and comfortable space, right near the main drag. Highly recommend!
The most lovely place. Would absolutely stay again next time in Taos
We loved our stay in this studio space. It was light and airy and well decorated. The bed was large and comfortable and we both slept very well there. Great stay and highly recommend.

This place is a gem! It looks just as cute in person as it does in pictures. Justin and Carmina were very responsive and provided great recommendations. Amenities were thoughtful and provided everything you would need. Bluetooth speakers and hammock were amazing touches and the bed was incredibly comfortable! One of our favorite airbnbs to date!

This is a wonderful spot to spend a few days in Taos. It’s a good location, quiet and comfortable.
Everything is in the ground floor. Our host was available and helpful. We had all we needed including easy access and an extra large comfortable king bed. Thank you for a lovely stay!
Have stayed at Justin’s place many times and feels like my home in Taos.
Beautiful home close to the heart of Taos. Will be back!

My partner and I stay in airbnbs often and Justin's place is the most well equipped place we have ever stayed in. He has everything you would ever need! The space is also beautifully decorated and very comfortable. Highly recommend this place!
We spent 2 nights in Taos and would definitely stay here again. The place was so nice and cozy, the trees in the yard made it feel secluded. It is beautiful and would highly recommend.

Gorgeous, spacious home away from home. Super easy check in and out. Next time we’d like to use the provided bikes! Just 10 minutes to Taos plaza. Total privacy. If a rooster crowing and light coming in through the skylights in the morning may bother you, come prepared. Lots of floor space to dance!
This place easily the best airbnb I’ve ever stayed in it was perfect! Secluded, quiet, and decorated nicely. It’s a perfect place for isolation to get your mind right and just be.

Absolutely loved our stay! My daughter and I stayed for a long weekend and are already planning a trip back. Perfect location. That is close to the plaza, but also felt secluded and special. Loved the vibe of the place too.
What a wonderful place! I highly recommend staying here while in Taos. The stars at night, the layout, decor, cleanliness, location, and host – All amazing!

Great Getaway in Taos! I felt right at home here and really relaxed. Everything that you need is provided in this excellent private location with comfortable and beautiful surroundings. A great place to take time out and chill. Close enough to everything in Taos.
Perfect design style and secluded lawn!
This is our second time at Justin"s space. We love it much, we made it back again and enjoyed it just as much as the first. It's beautiful, unique and comfortable. This is truly a gem in Taos.
The casita is very clean and comfortable, and it is spacious too. The patio is such a nice place to relax and take in the peacefulness of northern New Mexico. I highly recommend it!
This Airbnb was amazing. It was so peaceful and beautifully decorated. Justin was a great host. I will definitely be back and would recommend this listing to anyone looking to go to Taos.

I knew from the pictures that Justin’s spot would be special, but it truly exceeded my expectations! The studio is so stylish, the bed is comfortable and we had everything we needed for the kitchen, etc. We LOVED the bikes provided for us to use and rode them into town several times. Taos is such a special and unique place and staying here was the cherry on top!

This place is an absolute gem!!! So much love and intention put into this space. Was so perfect for our family of four, has everything you need. The decor is so beautiful, the energy is just so good, highly recommend and already excited to return. Great location, thoughtful details, so much character and charm. Love love love it!

My sisters and I came here for a weekend getaway and it was the most relaxing, peaceful place we could’ve stayed in Taos. The decor is fabulous, tons of privacy, close to town, clean, great amenities and very smooth checkin. Thank you Justin! We’ll be back for sure!
Beautiful place, much bigger in person.
My third time staying at Justin’s property. Needless to say, it feels like home! Justin is responsive and warm and a great communicator!

We had an amazing time at Casita Benitez! Justin was the perfect host - thoughtful, kind, quick to respond and flexible. We were in a bind and needed late check out and Justin went above and beyond by asking his housekeeper to come later so that he could accommodate us. He also offered us tons of great suggestions of things to do in the area. The home was tidy, well decorated and comfortable. The location is great, too!
Great stay! Loved everything about this place! Perfect.

Justin's place was light and airy and tranquil, the perfect place to relax after doing some of the hikes Justin suggested. A short, easy drive to Old Town Taos. His food recommendations were also very helpful. We also enjoyed the neighbor's rooster!

The casita was perfect for our 2 night stay. It was much larger and roomier than the photos and had all the conveniences/essentials for a comfortable stay. The furnishings were simple yet charming and we loved all the local decorative touches. The location was perfect too-5 minutes to town and hiking trails yet felt like it was "off grid". The casita was the highlight of our brief visit to Taos.

This is the second time staying at Justin's Casita. The first time was not nearly enough, so it was a pleasure staying even longer. It is a perfect and relaxing, down-to-earth getaway for anyone who wants to escape the monotony of daily life. Will be back in the future!

The casita was the perfect spot for me and my husband to stay as we explored Taos. It's very close to town, yet far enough away that it's so peaceful and quiet.
The bed and linens were heavenly and the decor was artful and welcoming.
We felt very at home there and will be staying again the next time we come to Taos.

What a great place for our first visit to Taos. It’s about 2 miles from town but so worth it ! It’s peaceful, warm and so very cozy. Justin was especially easy to communicate with and check in and out was very simple. Loved our stay so much ❤️

I'm not easy to impress, but this hit all the right buttons for me. The architecture, style, comfort— felt like a private retreat. So quiet and serene and lovely in every way. Can't say enough good things about this lovely accommodation. Really appreciated the quality and vibes of this location.
Casita Benitez was so so special to experience. The location was close enough to town to bike to (bikes provided by Justin) yet far enough to feel secluded. 10/10 would stay here again and again

We had an excellent two-night stay at the Casita. It was conveniently located close to town (we biked there with the bikes provided by Justin), and close to some great hiking trails. The Casita was tastefully decorated and extremely comfortable to relax in after a day of skiing, hiking, or walking around town. Justin is also a fantastic host, and provided numerous recommendations around town. I would highly recommend his Airbnb.
Fantastic experience, and Justin couldn’t have been a better host. Everything was seamless, and the place itself was comfortable and close to everything. Would absolutely stay on a return trip!

I can't imagine staying anywhere else in Taos after staying here. The location is ideal. It's far enough from the center of town to feel removed from the tourist bustle but still within easy reach everything. Nearby hiking options are abundant. The unit itself is impeccably and tastefully furnished, with a yard that invites you to lounge in the beauty that surrounds you. Easily one of the best places I've stayed.

This was a really magical place. I could have sat and looked out the front window watching the birds in the trees for hours. The bed was very comfortable and at night when the windows were closed up the place had a quite, calm cocoon feel to it. Even with the primary home and the B&B next-door it felt very private. This spot is only a 7 minute drive from town so you are very close to all the galleries, shops, restaurants and museums Taos has to offer. My only note to others would be that the claw foot tub in the bathroom is quite tall (above my knee at 5’6”). I absolutely loved it but if you had any mobility issues this would not be the bathroom for you. I would recommend Justin’s place to anybody looking for a place to stay that really feels like Taos.
We loved Justin's place! Secluded and quiet with tons of personality! We enjoyed watching the birds in the beautiful trees
What a charming Casita! Perfect for our family of three. Also a great location you to ski also enjoy the amenities of the town in the evening.
Very cute!! Good price!!
The Casita is a calm, peaceful place to stay. Very quiet and private. Absolutely would be our first choice in Taos if we visit again.
Justin’s place was super convenient for going into town, snowboarding, and even fishing. Super adorable place. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay there again.
We had such a wonderful stay! The space was beautiful and inviting. Justin had superb recommendations for us to maximize our stay.
This was an awesome Airbnb! Such a fun design, remarkably nice bedding, and close to all that we needed in Taos. I would recommend this place to anyone.

If this place is available grab it and don’t think twice!!! I could not have loved my week here more. I was here Dec 11-18, it was frosty cold- below freezing in the am and up to 40-50 in the afternoons, and we had a storm that left only a few inches of snow on the ground. Even with these few inches of snow the trails were awesome. Because of the altitude 40-50 in the sun feels super comfortable especially for hiking which I did every day. The casita is so close to magnificent trails. Close to town too, yet feels incredibly private and secluded. The pictures do capture the place and are a complete match for the warmth and light and cozy atmosphere. And the bed is no joke impossibly comfortable and feels like climbing into a cloud seriously a blissful respite of a place. I’m sure this place and space is wonderful in any season but winter was top notch. Also- so easy to arrive and depart all instructions very easy to follow. I arrived to a well lit and warm casita on a freezing day. Thank you!
A darling property in a beautiful town. Host Justin was on top of it; sharing recommendations for hiking and food spots as well as coming through with prompt communication. So appreciated this!!
Fabulous place to stay in Taos. Incredible energy in a peaceful abode.

Truly amazing. I echo all the other reviews and will add that I appreciated small details like the fact that the towels and bed linens had been laundered in a high end detergent with a wonderful smell, so my senses were delighted at the subtlest level. The portraits of the Native American chiefs and Georgia O’Keeffe really set the tone for mindfulness and thoughtful contemplation.
The ukulele and guitar on the wall invited my creativity as did the song charts I found in a dresser drawer. ❤️
I stayed at the Casita during the big lunar eclipse and was thrilled to watch the changing moon through the skylights.
Soaking in the wonderful tub with endless hot water also made me feel taken care of. I’d stay here again anytime, it’s a true oasis.
This place is lovely. Cute details, well designed. It is a bit out of town, which I enjoyed. Host provided lots of good recommendations in the area.

Great place! The bed was super comfortable - almost too comfortable - we slept right through dinner the first night we arrived!. The place is a Close ride into town and everything we wanted to see in the area. The bikes were a nice touch to ride around as well. We’d stay again!

A beautiful oasis within an oasis. One of my favorite airbb stays- super comfortable, thoughtful, restful and peaceful stay and very hard to leave! I look forward to returning with more time. Thank you!

My partner and I had the pleasure of staying at this lovely studio for a weeklong stay in Taos. It was equipped with everything you could possibly want or need for a short- or long-term stay, and stylishly decorated to boot. Justin was super easy to communicate with and all-around a thoughtful host. WiFi was fast enough for both of us to work from home and stream/be on video calls simultaneously. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a comfortable place to stay in this charming town.

I freaking loved my stay here. I could live in this cute place. I did 2 nights here and 3 farther out in Taos and it was the prefect mix. The decor was amazing, so clean, so unique. The lighting was so nice, everything had been so well tended to. The bed was so comfy, the windows let it such nice light, the skylights, mmmmmm. I even woke up one of the nights and saw the moon in the skylight. Loved the high-er brow coffee tools. The kitchen was more than big enough to cook anything. The tub was spotless, water hot!
Justin was super easy to communicate w. I felt special and cared for in this space. Also, great selection of books.

Our stay at Justin’s Airbnb was phenomenal. The decor and aesthetic was thoughtful and intentional. It was the most comfortable place we stayed while in New Mexico (the sheets and mattress were amazing). Justin messaged me the day morning we were to check in to send me a list of all the recommendations I could ever need while in Taos. Check in/out was as easy as it gets and the house is very private. We are more than satisfied with our stay would recommend Justin’s place in a heartbeat!

We absolutely loved our stay! It’s the perfect retreat just minutes from town. Justin was incredibly kind and gave us the most helpful list of places to eat, things to do and see, and was available whenever we had a quick question! Couldn’t recommend this stay enough☺️ We’ll be back again!

Justin’s place is even better in person than it looks in the photos as it delights all of your senses. The textiles are soft and delicious, it’s spacious and light, the bed is super comfy and the kitchen is very well equipped. Justin’s exceptional attention to detail has given you everything you could ask for in a super styled, quiet, peaceful and gorgeous southwestern retreat. I can’t wait to come back!
Great spot with amazing history. A great home base for a trip to Taos.

I loved this stay! I’m in Taos often and it’s a place I would definitely return to. Very stylish. Very cozy. Felt very peaceful and private. Justin was incredibly welcoming and we even had a blizzard one night and he checked in to make sure I had what I needed. The bed was SO comfy which is super important! Highly recommend.
We enjoyed the darling retreat! Close to town and wonderful outdoor activities! Justin was a fabulous host and took care of all the details! We would definitely recommend the lovely Air B & B

My favorite Air B&B rental yet! This cozy casita was perfect for our getaway to Taos. Cozy and yet plenty of room and amenities. The host messaged with great recommendations for hikes, sites and restaurants in the area.

I had a wonderful stay at Casa Benitez. It is even nicer in person than in the photos and made for a perfect home base on my trip to Taos. Justin is a gracious host - he let me borrow a Macbook charger and kindly washed the bedding/towels with unscented detergent. One evening, I sat outside and was able to see the Milky Way. The kitchen is thoughtfully appointed and I had everything I needed for light cooking during my stay. One detail that I enjoyed was the binder that shared the history of the home. I also really appreciated Justin's dining recommendations - each is on point. I highly recommend staying here and would love to stay here again. Thank you!
Lovely private casita that provided the rest and relaxation I needed. The setting is peaceful and I so enjoyed sitting on the porch enjoying the Taos fresh air and sunshine!
Wonderful place to stay while enjoying Taos and the surrounding area. We loved spending our time there and would recommend it to others.

A special place. Instantly palpable energy when you enter and impeccably styled. Justin sent extensive info on check-in and recs for the area. Replied rapidly to questions. As others have noted, temperature is perhaps the one issue. Was pretty toasty on our early September days there. Not prohibitive at all, remedied easily with fans, just something to note and plan on for those who are sensitive to heat or cold. But our only real issue was having booked just two nights. Already looking forward to a longer stay next time.

I wish this Airbnb was my home. The styling is so perfect and thoughtful. The area is so quiet and serene, and a super quick drive to downtown Taos. We truly did not want to leave we could have stayed forever. Highly recommend this spot for your stay in Taos!
Great location, super stay
Great place to stay in Taos

The Casita is just as advertised.
It’s a quaint, well-decorated studio — just out of the way enough to be peaceful but easy to get into town and out for hiking. A terrific spot for a late-summer getaway.
Justin is a great host.
Fabulous location for exploring the Taos area. The casita’s decor was fit for a magazine. It had everything we needed and more! Would go back in a heartbeat!!!

What an absolutely incredible place to stay. WOW! The decor and styling were the boho dream. The bedding was like sleeping on a cloud. Super close to downtown and easy to get to. This place is a must when you stay in Taos

You will not regret staying here! Beautiful space in a quite arts town!
Very comfortable, felt joyful and excited for the day waking up there in the morning with the beautiful sky lights.
Amazing stay, can’t wait to come again!
Great spot! Super interesting, excellent communication and a great stay
We loved it…a very relaxing and cozy place to stay while exploring Taos. Justin is also incredibly responsive and thoughtful. He clearly cares about his guests’ experience and it shows.
nice little place with calming decor and comfortable lounge space
We loved the casita. So clean and spacious and restful. We’d come back!
Quiet, Clean, Peaceful, Great Value, Spacious.

Justin - and his casita - were fabulous! Justin went out of his way to be sure the experience was incredible - he had lots of great suggestions about the best places to see in the place that he obviously loves. Highly recommend!

Peaceful. Welcoming and spotless. I so enjoyed the hammock inside. What a great space, artistically curated and simply lovely.. We really appreciated Justin’s guide book and recommendations. Spot on. We absolutely hope to return!!
Beautiful and comfortable place. Would definitely stay here again!!
This place is amazing! Gorgeous and cozy inside, great outdoor space. My boyfriend and I wanted to buy the place! Plus, super close to shops and restaurants.
A perfect retreat. Beautiful environment, extremely clean and taken care of, close enough to town to make outings and trips easy, and a thoughtful and responsive host.

I’ve stayed at Justin’s place three times and always can’t wait to get back! It’s decorated so beautifully that gives it a very peaceful feel. It’s always such a relaxing stay. Very quiet and comfortable. I enjoy listening to the birds sing outside. And I seriously love the bed and pillows more than my own.

Two of us really loved the vibe. Nice bluetooth speaker that made us want to dance as we imagined Maria Benitez creating movement in this adorable space. Although unseasonably hot for Taos during our stay, the adobe studio and swamp cooler worked well after a great day of hiking. The location was close to town yet quiet and peaceful. Especially loved sitting outdoors on the patio, watching the sky light up as the sun went down. Photos and description are accurate. We highly recommend staying here.
Absolutely loved your home and the decor was amazing! You are the perfect host and we hope to return soon.

We had such a great time staying at Casita Benitez. Everything about the house was comfortable and unique. We really liked the seclusion, but also being so close to town. Great hikes are all around. It’s very clear the hosts care about this place and keep it a special place. We enjoyed sitting on the porch and taking in the surroundings. The history of the house was interesting to read about. And the books scattered around the house are top notch reads. We look forward to a change to visit again and give many thanks to Justin for allowing us to spend some time here.
Everything about Justin's place was just perfect - the decorations, the outdoor patio, the location, etc. We truly enjoyed staying at the Casa Benitez and can't wait to come back!

I want to keep it a secret, but must give credit where it's due. This peaceful, enchanting, and inspiring space was even more than I hoped for. I left feeling rejuvenated and full of gratitude. The neighborhood is perfect for early morning walks, the big windows and large private yard immerse you in nature. Every special touch is warm and inviting. Justin was a top notch host. I spent a week here alone during my intensives week for grad school. I had to zoom all day and the internet did not disappoint. I couldn't imagine a better space to do it, and I'm so grateful I booked it.

Justin's place is very clean, quiet, and the perfect home base for a Taos trip. The space is well thought out and was the perfect place to unwind after a day hiking and taking in Taos. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a Zen retreat in Taos.

Justin was an awesome host! He was super available whenever we had questions or concerns and always willing to help. He offered a great list of recommendations for things to do and where to eat, which was super helpful. The airbnb was very clean and a great location for us to be able to explore Taos!
This space is simply magical. And Justin is full of good recommendations. You can feel the history in the space and it’s amazing to be a part of. Will definitely return here when coming back to NM.
An absolute sanctuary. Very special place and very awesome host. The bathtub, the hammock, the birds, the view, the peace, the quiet...perfection. Just do it.

Fabulous stay! Loved the character and history behind this inviting casita. Very chic! Super comfy bed! Very clean! Conveniently located. Justin is a good communicator and provided a lot of great recommendations. Would highly recommend this stay!

Justin and Jade's spot is absolutely perfect. If you think it looks good in the photos, wait to be pleasantly surprised. It's spacious, tasteful, and has excellent energy throughout. My finacé and I both worked from the studio for a week and it never felt cramped or small, there are so many different "spots" to hang out in! We really felt at home here and enjoyed cooking/lounging in the casita every night. The list of recommended restaurants and spots in Taos was spot on and we were just a 4min drive from some incredible hiking.
Justin was so accommodating prior and during our stay, a really excellent host and he helped to make our time in Taos so wonderful. They were readily available with our questions and requests throughout our stay.
Lots of folks have said this is their favourite airbnb and I might have to join that tribe! Thank you Justin and Jade for being wonderful hosts!
Outrageously overpriced, given the size and location of the facility and the quality of the furnishings.
